source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000010_TATARU<tab>It's so much quieter these days without everyone around...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000010_TATARU<tab>Depuis la dissolution des Héritiers, tout est bien calme par ici...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000020_TATARU<tab>...Not that I'm pining for your return, you understand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000020_TATARU<tab>Mais ne vous inquiétez pas pour moi, je n'ai pas de raison d'être triste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000030_TATARU<tab>I have my sources, and I know that each and every one of you is doing well and keeping busy with your endeavors!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000030_TATARU<tab>Grâce à mon formidable réseau d'informateurs, je sais que tout le monde vaque bien tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment à ses affaires<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000040_TATARU<tab>Meanwhile, I'm left with a surplus of free time─and the question of how to make the most of it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000040_TATARU<tab>Et puis, maintenant que j'ai un peu de temps libre, moi aussi... Je me suis mise à réfléchir à mon avenir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000050_TATARU<tab>What about you? Any plans for the immediate future?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000050_TATARU<tab>Et vous, alors<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce que vous allez faire à partir de maintenant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>A grand new adventure, of course!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je veux repartir à l'aventure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm still mulling it over...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je vais chercher de quoi m'occuper.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000060_TATARU<tab>Traveling to the edge of existence and back wasn't enough!? Well, if that's the case, I might have a suggestion for you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000060_TATARU<tab>Hi hi hi<var 1D /var>! Je savais que vous diriez ça<var 1D /var>! Apparemment, ça ne vous a pas suffi d'arpenter les confins de l'univers. Dans ce cas, laissez-moi vous faire une suggestion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000070_TATARU<tab>I hope you weren't thinking of asking <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> for advice! Though, if you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> open to suggestions, I might have one for you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000070_TATARU<tab>Ah, vous n'avez encore rien de prévu<var 1D /var>? Dans ce cas, laissez-moi vous faire une suggestion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000080_TATARU<tab>After what you went through, I'm not surprised you need a moment to think. But if you're open to suggestions, I might have one for you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000080_TATARU<tab>Après tout ce que vous avez vécu récemment, ça ne m'étonne pas que vous soyez un peu perdu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Dans ce cas, laissez-moi vous faire une suggestion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000090_TATARU<tab>You've fought bravely and selflessly, helping those in need and saving our star from unimaginable threats.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000090_TATARU<tab>Jusqu'à présent, vous vous êtes surtout démené<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour sauver des innocents et défendre le monde contre diverses menaces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000100_TATARU<tab>For your deeds, you've been hailed as the champion of Eorzea and a host of other incredible things. But why not put those titles aside for a while?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000100_TATARU<tab>Vos actes vous ont valu le titre <var 08 E905 ((d'héroïne)) ((de héros)) /var>, mais je crois qu'il vaudrait mieux le mettre de côté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000110_TATARU<tab>Acquit yourself as a simple adventurer again, and travel the world in search of wonder!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000110_TATARU<tab>Rappelez-vous l'époque où vous avez poussé les portes du Refuge des sables pour la première fois... Et si vous redeveniez <var 08 E905 ((une)) ((un)) /var> simple <var 08 E905 ((aventurière)) ((aventurier)) /var>, juste pour voir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're right! Who knows what mysteries are still waiting to be discovered?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Qui sait quel genre de mystères il reste encore à découvrir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>That's a great idea. But where to start...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Oui, mais... par où commencer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000120_TATARU<tab>That's the spirit! I can feel from here the blazing fire that just lit in your belly!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000120_TATARU<tab>Hé hé<var 1D /var>! Voilà votre instinct d'<var 08 E905 ((aventurière)) ((aventurier)) /var> qui revient au galop<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000130_TATARU<tab>Now all you need is a destination.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000130_TATARU<tab>Mais dites-moi, vous avez déjà une idée de votre prochaine destination<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000135_TATARU<tab>If you're having trouble deciding, just leave it to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000135_TATARU<tab>Si vous ne savez pas quoi faire, laissez-moi vous suggérer une destination de choix<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000140_TATARU<tab>Ahhh, with so many exciting places to choose from, it's hard to narrow it down...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000140_TATARU<tab>Je comprends votre réaction... Notre monde est immense et réserve encore son lot de surprises.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000150_TATARU<tab>But I believe I have the perfect destination in mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000150_TATARU<tab>Ne vous inquiétez pas, j'ai une proposition qui risque fort de vous intéresser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000160_TATARU<tab>If you're having trouble deciding, just leave it to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000160_TATARU<tab>Si vous ne savez pas quoi faire, laissez-moi vous suggérer une destination de choix<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000170_TATARU<tab>Thavnair─that's where you should go next!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000170_TATARU<tab>Je vous le donne en mille<var 1D /var>: il s'agit de nulle part ailleurs que Thavnair<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000180_TATARU<tab>I doubt you were able to squeeze in a proper tour of Radz-at-Han the last time you were there, what with the burning skies and rampaging monsters and so forth. And I'm sure Vrtra would be pleased to see you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000180_TATARU<tab>Entre la tour de Zott et le chaos provoqué par l'apocalypse, vous n'avez pas eu le loisir de profiter de l'île. De plus, je pense que Vrtra serait heureux de vous avoir sous la main.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000190_TATARU<tab>Then there's the Bounty itself. The Empire's presence in the region was always a deterrent to exploration, so if you've a mind to sail that sea, now's your chance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000190_TATARU<tab>Sans compter que la proximité de l'Empire empêchait jusque-là de s'aventurer trop loin sur la mer de l'Abondance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000200_TATARU<tab>Just think of all the new experiences you could have!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000200_TATARU<tab>Je suis certaine que de nombreux secrets n'attendent que vous pour être révélés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000210_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)Tell me, have you been to the ruins beneath the waters of the Bounty?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000210_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)As-tu déjà exploré les ruines qui dorment au fin fond de la mer de l'Abondance<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000220_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)As the bearer of Azem's crystal, you may consider your duty to see at least that much.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000220_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)Tu possèdes le cristal d'Azem. Alors fais-lui honneur, et admire tous ces paysages.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000230_TATARU<tab>Oh, I know that look! That's an adventurer ready to take on the world!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000230_TATARU<tab>Vous avez le visage de quelqu'un qui est prêt à partir vers l'inconnu... Le chemin vers votre prochaine destination semble donc tout tracé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000240_TATARU<tab>In anticipation of an occasion like this, I was planning to gift you a new set of traveling clothes, but it's, uh, still a work in progress.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000240_TATARU<tab>Pour marquer le coup, je comptais vous offrir une nouvelle tenue de voyage, mais... elle n'est pas encore terminée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000250_TATARU<tab>Shouldn't take much longer now, though, so sit tight, and I'll have the last few bits sewn up before you can finish another cup of tea!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000250_TATARU<tab>Plus que quelques ajustements et elle sera sur mesure<var 1D /var>! Vous voulez bien m'attendre ici, le temps que je finisse<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q99_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q99_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A99_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're the best, Tataru.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A99_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Merci pour tout, Tataru.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A99_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Make sure it has pockets!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A99_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'ai hâte de voir ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000260_TATARU<tab>Stitching here and trimming there, knot the threads with love and care...♪
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000260_TATARU<tab>Donc ça, je le mets là... Et ce truc-là... Comme ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000270_TATARU<tab>Just a little more to go! I'm sure you're still brimming with excitement!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000270_TATARU<tab>Encore un tout petit peu de patience, je n'en ai plus pour très longtemps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000280_TATARU<tab>Hee hee! I am one with the needle! See how the fabric surrenders to my whims!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000280_TATARU<tab>Ho ho<var 1D /var>! Croyez-moi, ça va être ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nel<var 1D /var>! Plus je couds, plus j'ai de nouvelles idées<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000290_TATARU<tab>Don't worry, I'll make sure the lining has plenty of pockets for all your little “treasures.” I swear, adventurers are worse than children when it comes to hoarding every feather and leaf and animal hide they come across...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000290_TATARU<tab>Je vous ai ajouté des poches à plusieurs endroits<var 1D /var>! Après tout, vous autres <var 08 E905 ((aven<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rières)) ((aventuriers)) /var> adorez ramasser tout et n'importe quoi... Même si ça ne vous sert à rien, d'ailleurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000300_TATARU<tab>Oh, we mustn't forget the waterproofing. Gods forbid you forget to disrobe before plunging into the sea. Or a river. Or a piping hot bath...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000300_TATARU<tab>Et il ne faut pas oublier d'imperméabiliser le tout... Je vous connais, moi<var 1D /var>! Quand vous vous jetez à l'eau, c'est habillé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de la tête aux pieds<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And thus I am returned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ah... Me voilà de retour...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000320_TATARU<tab>Ah, you're awake...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000320_TATARU<tab>Vous êtes enfin réveillé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000330_TATARU<tab>My apologies, I do get a little carried away with my sewing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000330_TATARU<tab>Désolée de vous avoir fait attendre aussi longtemps<var 1D /var>! Une fois l'aiguille entre les doigts, je ne peux plus m'arrêter...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000340_TATARU<tab>You seem awfully cheerful. Pleasant dream? Or are you just looking forward to the next chapter of your grand saga?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000340_TATARU<tab>Vous avez fait de beaux rêves<var 1D /var>? Ou est-ce la perspective de repartir à la découverte de l'inconnu qui vous rend aussi enjoué<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000350_TATARU<tab>Either way, I promised to provide you with new apparel, and so I shall!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000350_TATARU<tab>En tout cas, je pense vous avoir con<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>né la tenue idéale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000360_TATARU<tab>If you'll accompany me to the Diamond Forge, we can put the finishing touches on your outfit. Shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000360_TATARU<tab>Je dois aller à La Forge de diamant pour y appliquer les finitions. Que diriez-vous de m'accompagner<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000370_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)Please, Zasshal! Please! You must let me have that treasure map!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000370_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Jeune garçon démuni-)Allez Zasshal, fais un geste<var 1D /var>! Laisse-la-moi, cette carte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000380_BAZAARMOBA<tab>What's all this about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000380_BAZAARMOBA<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que c'est que ce raffut<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000390_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)My mother and father were slaughtered by monsters! My baby sister, still too young to fend for herself! Can you spare us no kindness!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000390_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Jeune garçon démuni-)Mon papa et ma maman... sont morts, tués par les bêtes de l'apocalypse<var 1D /var>! Il... Il reste plus que moi pour m'occuper de ma petite sœur, alors...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000400_ZASSHAL<tab>So, you hope to find your fortune. And what? You expect me to surrender my wares for pity's sake?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000400_ZASSHAL<tab>Alors tu t'es dit que mettre le grappin sur des trésors, ça réglerait tes problèmes<var 1D /var>? Désolé gamin, mais j'fais pas dans la charité. Si tu veux une carte, aboule la monnaie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000410_ZASSHAL<tab>What have you to offer in payment?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000410_ZASSHAL<tab>Mais laisse-moi deviner<var 1D /var>: t'as pas de quoi te l'offrir, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000420_ZASSHAL<tab>As I thought! Come back when you've more than rags to your name!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000420_ZASSHAL<tab>Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! Si t'as pas le pognon, reste pas planté là. J'ai des affaires à mener, moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000430_ZASSHAL<tab>This is no mere treasure map! It is a guide to the vaults of Alzadaal III─one of the great satraps of Radz-at-Han, and a direct descendant of Alzadaal Khan!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000430_ZASSHAL<tab>Cette carte, c'est pas de la gnognotte<var 1D /var>! Elle mène droit au palais caché d'Alzadaal troisième du nom, l'un des premiers satrapes de notre belle cité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000440_BAZAARMOBA<tab>A map to Alzadaal's Legacy...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000440_BAZAARMOBA<tab>Le palais caché d'Alzadaal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000450_BAZAARMOBB<tab>So he says...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000450_BAZAARMOBB<tab>Il existe vraiment<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000460_BAZAARMOBC<tab>(-Bazaar Patron-)A fake, I'd wager!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000460_BAZAARMOBC<tab>(-Passant du Bazar-)Ça sent l'attrape-nigaud cette histoire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000470_ZASSHAL<tab>This is no fake! The parchment is marked with an arcane glyph of passage!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000470_ZASSHAL<tab>Hé oh<var 1D /var>! Me jetez pas la pierre si vite<var 1D /var>! Y a sur cette carte la formule exacte permettant d'ouvrir les portes de ce palais aux trésors<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000480_ZASSHAL<tab>You may find the ruins hidden in the Bounty, but you won't be setting foot inside without this in your possession!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000480_ZASSHAL<tab>Parce que même si vous arriviez à trouver l'entrée, vous resteriez bloqués<var 1D /var>! J'vous le dis, elle est tout ce qu'il y a de plus authentique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000490_ZASSHAL<tab>A priceless artifact, it is! Discovered amongst the rubble in the aftermath of the Final Days, and lovingly restored by yours truly!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000490_ZASSHAL<tab>Des artisans l'ont dénichée dans des bâtiments détruits lors de l'apocalypse. Elle était dans un bien triste état... Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment que j'ai pu la restaurer de mes mains habiles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000500_ZASSHAL<tab>This map is the key to fabulous riches, and I would be the king of fools to simply <var 1A 02 /var>give<var 1A 01 /var> it away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000500_ZASSHAL<tab>Avec ça en poche, c'est le gros lot assuré<var 1D /var>! Enfin, pour ceux qui peuvent se l'offrir. Pour les autres, adieu les rêves de fortune<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000510_ZASSHAL<tab>Be glad I am no such king, boy─your scrawny hide would never return with that treasure alive!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000510_ZASSHAL<tab>Bah, de toute façon, une demi-portion comme toi serait déjà morte avant même d'avoir mis la main sur la moindre piécette<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000520_ZASSHAL<tab>Gahahaha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000520_ZASSHAL<tab>Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000530_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)O cruel fate! Why must you tempt me with wealth I am powerless to claim!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000530_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Jeune garçon démuni-)... Et merde<var 1D /var>! Dire que j'ai sous les yeux de quoi m'en sortir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000540_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)How I shall envy the one who purchases that precious map! Whatever they pay will be but a pittance against the golden hoard they stand to uncover!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000540_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Jeune garçon démuni-)Il en a de la chance, celui qui mettra la main sur cette carte<var 1D /var>! Les trésors enfouis valent bien une dizaine... Non, une centaine de fois son prix<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000550_ZASSHAL<tab>What of you, sir? A fighting man of your stature would surely relish the challenge of recovering Alzadaal's lost fortune!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000550_ZASSHAL<tab>Z'êtes intéressé<var 1D /var>? On parle du palais englouti d'Alzadaal III tout de même<var 1D /var>! Vous m'avez l'air par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment équipé pour aller explorer les lieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000560_ESTINIEN<tab>A fortune, you say...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000560_ESTINIEN<tab>Une carte au trésor, hein...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000570_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Ragged Waif-)If I had but the strength to seize that treasure, my starving sister would never want for food!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000570_MEHRAHD<tab>(-Jeune garçon démuni-)Si seulement j'étais plus fort, je partirais à la recherche de ce palais pour nourrir ma pauvre petite sœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000580_ESTINIEN<tab>I'll take it. Will this cover the price?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000580_ESTINIEN<tab>D'accord, je la prends. Ça suffira pour ta peine<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000590_ESTINIEN<tab>Well met, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000590_ESTINIEN<tab>Tiens... Salut, camarade.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000600_ESTINIEN<tab>Someone is dressed for adventure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000600_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmm... Alors comme ça, tu es reparti<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à l'aventure, toi aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000610_ESTINIEN<tab>But why Thavnair of all places? Knowing you, I suspect there is more to your plans than sightseeing and shopping.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000610_ESTINIEN<tab>Qu'est-ce qui t'amène à Thavnair<var 1D /var>? Tu n'es pas venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> en simple touriste, je me trompe<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000620_ESTINIEN<tab>Ruins beneath the Bounty...? Curious. And here I've acquired a map to just such a site...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000620_ESTINIEN<tab>Un palais enfoui sous la mer de l'Abondance... Le hasard fait bien les choses, je viens tout juste de mettre la main sur une carte indiquant sa position.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000630_ZASSHAL<tab>With that sale, I do believe I've earned the rest of the day off. Thank you for your patronage, sir, but if you'll excuse me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000630_ZASSHAL<tab>Bien, puisque l'affaire est dans le sac, j'ai fini ma journée. Sur ce, à la revoyure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000640_ESTINIEN<tab>You needn't mind us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000640_ESTINIEN<tab>Ah, désolé. On ne va pas vous déranger plus longtemps, en effet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000650_ZASSHAL<tab>And now I've fleeced one of the heroes of the Final Days. I pray the Sisters were looking elsewhere...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000650_ZASSHAL<tab>J'aurais jamais pensé croiser en chair et en os <var 08 E905 ((l'héroïne)) ((le héros)) /var> qui nous a sauvés de l'apocalypse. J'espère qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> n'y a vu que du feu, sinon... gare aux re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sail<var 16 /var>les.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000660_ESTINIEN<tab>This map may or may not be genuine. Either way, we'll need a ship to find out for sure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000660_ESTINIEN<tab>Il va nous falloir un bateau si on souhaite vérifier l'authenticité de cette carte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You seem eager to be underway.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu m'as l'air sacrément motivé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I never took you for a treasure hunter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Curieux de mettre la main sur le trésor<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>Lest you misunderstand, I seek the treasure not for myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>Ces richesses cachées ne m'intéressent pas personnellement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000680_ESTINIEN<tab>If such a fortune truly exists, then it could help ease the struggles of those who lost their loved ones in the Final Days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000680_ESTINIEN<tab>Mais suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment de gens subissent de plein fouet les con<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>quen<var 16 /var>ces de l'apocalypse. Ils auraient bien besoin de quelques fonds sup<var 16 /var>plé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>res pour les aider.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000690_ESTINIEN<tab>I hope to do for Thavnair what you and Alphinaud did for the Ala Mhigans when you recovered the mad king's trove.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000690_ESTINIEN<tab>Un peu comme ce que tu as fait avec le trésor de Theodoric, à Ala Mhigo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000700_ESTINIEN<tab>Come now, you know Alphinaud needs little encouragement when it comes to recounting the tales of your shared exploits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000700_ESTINIEN<tab>C'est Alphinaud qui me l'a raconté, je ne sais plus quand. Ça, et plusieurs de vos péripéties.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>Speaking of precocious lads, that boy in the bazaar was clearly an accomplice of the merchant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>Tu sais, ce gamin pleurnichard à côté du marchand de cartes... Je mettrais ma main à couper qu'ils sont de mèche tous les deux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000720_ESTINIEN<tab>I suppose his role was to draw the attention of the crowd and add weight to the merchant's bold claims.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000720_ESTINIEN<tab>Rien de tel qu'un peu de comédie pour attirer le chaland et faire monter la valeur d'un objet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000730_ESTINIEN<tab>A transparent act for the most part, but 'twas not all mummery─the need to provide for his sister rang true enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000730_ESTINIEN<tab>Mais quand il a dit avoir besoin d'argent pour nourrir sa petite sœur, son regard avait l'air on ne peut plus sincère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000740_ESTINIEN<tab>Thus if some portion of the profits end up in that waif's pockets, then I will consider it money well spent...whether the map leads us to the vault or not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000740_ESTINIEN<tab>Je ne sais pas quelle part de la vente était la sienne, mais il devrait avoir de quoi s'offrir ce qu'il veut pour un moment. Au final, peu m'importe que la carte soit vraie ou non.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000750_ESTINIEN<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> coming along, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000750_ESTINIEN<tab>Tu comptes m'accompagner, camarade<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Naturally!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Évidemment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Shall we split the expenses?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>On fait moitié-moitié sur le prix de la carte<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000760_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmph, I thought as much.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000760_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmpf<var 1D /var>! J'aurais dû m'en douter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000770_ESTINIEN<tab>I appreciate the concern, but if there is one thing I've learned from my time with the Scions, it is how to better manage my coinpurse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000770_ESTINIEN<tab>C'est gentil de t'inquiéter pour mon porte-monnaie, mais ne t'en fais pas. S'il y a bien une chose que j'ai apprise grâce aux Héritiers, c'est à mieux gérer mon argent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000780_ESTINIEN<tab>Now, let's see about securing a vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000780_ESTINIEN<tab>Avant tout, il va nous falloir trouver un bateau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>I've never known Y'shtola to doze off in the middle of research before...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>On ne voit pas ça tous les jourrrs. Y'shtola tellement absorbée par ses recherches qu'elle s'est endormie au milieu de ses livres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000800_YSHTOLA<tab>Mmm... I close my eyes for one moment...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000800_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh... Je me suis assoupie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000810_YSHTOLA<tab>Ow!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000810_YSHTOLA<tab>Aïe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>How long have you two been here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>Vous êtes là depuis longtemps, tous les deux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000830_YSHTOLA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000830_YSHTOLA<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>We just arrived!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>On vient juste d'arriver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We didn't want to wake you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>On ne voulait pas te réveiller.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Catching up on some light reading?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu as plongé un peu trop pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment dans tes recherches<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000840_YSHTOLA<tab>Did you now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000840_YSHTOLA<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000850_YSHTOLA<tab>Nor did I want to fall asleep.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000850_YSHTOLA<tab>Il ne fallait pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000860_YSHTOLA<tab>...Something to that effect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000860_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui... Comme tu peux le voir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>I must have been studying for two...three days straight before exhaustion finally claimed me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>Cela doit bien faire deux... non, trois jours que je n'ai pas dormi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>As you know, I've been researching ways to travel from the Source to one of its reflections.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>Hydaelyn a fractionné le monde primitif pour donner naissance à treize reflets.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000890_YSHTOLA<tab>Well...looking for hints, at least. I don't expect to find a simple set of instructions tucked away in some dark corner of the library.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000890_YSHTOLA<tab>J'étais à la recherche d'indices qui me permettraient d'en apprendre un peu plus sur le moyen de voyager entre notre monde et les autres. Évidemment, la solution toute faite n'existe pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000900_YSHTOLA<tab>So I've been skimming through the stacks, hoping to uncover even a partial mention of any similar feats in the past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000900_YSHTOLA<tab>Cependant, en analysant ici et là des fragments d'histoires mentionnant d'autres dimensions, je pensais pouvoir recoller les morceaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000910_YSHTOLA<tab>A means to travel between worlds exists, and you can be sure I will find a way to employ it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000910_YSHTOLA<tab>“Je finirai bien par trouver un sort me permettant de voyager librement entre les mondes...”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000920_YSHTOLA<tab>So I promised Runar, but 'twould seem I've set myself a nigh-impossible task.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000920_YSHTOLA<tab>On pourrait croire à des paroles en l'air, mais je suis bien consciente que cette tâche sera longue et ardue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000930_GRAHATIA<tab>You needn't be so hard on yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000930_GRAHATIA<tab>Ne désespèrrre pas si vite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000940_GRAHATIA<tab>The leap I made with the Crystal Tower was not achieved in an afternoon─it was the culmination of a collective effort spanning generations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000940_GRAHATIA<tab>Pour réussir à faire voyager la Tour de Cristal à travers les dimensions, il aura fallu les efforts conjoints de plusieurs générations d'esprits brillants. Sharlayan ne s'est pas construite en un jourrr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh, you think me discouraged? I assure you, 'tis quite the opposite.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu trouves que j'ai l'air désespérée<var 1D /var>? Au contraire, c'est tout l'inverse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000960_YSHTOLA<tab>A daunting challenge and the time to sink my teeth into it? I feel like a fresh-faced student again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000960_YSHTOLA<tab>J'ai enfin le sentiment de m'atteler à une tâche digne de ce nom. C'est comme si j'avais retrouvé mon âme d'enfant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000970_GRAHATIA<tab>A scholar in her element.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000970_GRAHATIA<tab>Je me suis inquiété pour rrrien, alors.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000980_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. Was there something else you wished to ask of me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000980_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais au fait, qu'est-ce qui vous amène ici, tous les deux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000990_YSHTOLA<tab>Alzadaal is no minor figure in Hannish history, and much is known about his family.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_000990_YSHTOLA<tab>Alzadaal... J'ai déjà entendu ce nom pendant notre séjour à Radz-at-Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>But this is the first I've heard of a descendant surviving a trip to another world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>Par contre, cette histoire de troisième du nom qui aurait voyagé dans un autre reflet m'est totalement inconnue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001010_YSHTOLA<tab>If those tales are true, then he may have left behind some clue as to how it was accomplished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001010_YSHTOLA<tab>Si tout cela est vrai, je trouverai peut-être de quoi faire avancer mes recherches dans ce palais englouti.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>An invitation to delve into one of the world's lingering mysteries? As if I could refuse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>Hah<var 1D /var>! Un périple à la découverte des mystères de ce monde... Voilà qui me met l'eau à la bouche<var 1D /var>! Laissez-moi me joindre à vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001030_YSHTOLA<tab>And whence do we embark upon this expedition?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001030_YSHTOLA<tab>Au fait, comment comptez-vous parvenir jusqu'à la cachette de ces fameux trésors<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001040_GRAHATIA<tab>Akyaali, by ship─but before that, we thought to extend an invitation to Urianger as well. He was in Thaumazein, last we heard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001040_GRAHATIA<tab>Un bateau nous attend à Akyaali. Mais avant ça, on pensait inviter Urianger à cette petite expédition. Si mes souvenirrrs sont bons, il se trouve au Thaumazein, dans le Labyrinthos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001050_YSHTOLA<tab>Then by all means, let us recruit him and be on our way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001050_YSHTOLA<tab>Ne restons pas là, alors. Allons vite le voir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001060_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, Ojika, my good man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001060_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, Ojika<var 1D /var>? Tu tombes à point nommé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001070_GRAHATIA<tab>Would you be so...kind...as to...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001070_GRAHATIA<tab>Désolé, mais est-ce que tu pourrais me rrrendre un... service...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001080_KRILE<tab>Isn't this a pleasant surprise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001080_KRILE<tab>Salut<var 1D /var>! Ravie de te revoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001090_GRAHATIA<tab>I wish you had sent word ahead. I thought I was having visions for a moment there!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001090_GRAHATIA<tab>Tu aurais pu me prrrévenir que tu allais passer... Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que ce soit toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What are the two of you working on?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Qu'est-ce que vous faites ici tous les deux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>How is the restoration of the Students coming along?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Comment se portent les Élèves de Baldesion<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001100_KRILE<tab>Raha and I have been compiling old records of the Students' activities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001100_KRILE<tab>Raha et moi sommes en train d'élaborer un plan pour remettre les Élèves de Baldesion sur les rails. Voilà pourquoi on inspecte d'anciens rapports.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001110_KRILE<tab>Slow and steady. Raha and I have been compiling old records of the Students' activities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001110_KRILE<tab>Eh bien, on travaille dur pour remettre l'or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion sur pied. Voilà pourquoi Raha et moi inspectons d'anciens rapports.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001120_KRILE<tab>We were able to locate several accounts in the archives of Noumenon, but the bulk of our documents was lost along with the Isle of Val...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001120_KRILE<tab>Seulement, la documentation disponible au Noumène n'est pas très exhaustive. Tout a disparu avec l'île de Val, j'en ai bien peur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001130_KRILE<tab>We located several accounts in the archives of Noumenon, and added them to the collection we recovered from the Isle of Val.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001130_KRILE<tab>On rassemble ce qu'on a trouvé au Noumène ainsi que les documents qui ont pu être récupérés sur l'île de Val.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001140_GRAHATIA<tab>And judging by the progress we've made thus far, sorting this pile will keep us occupied for days to come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001140_GRAHATIA<tab>En vérité, on vient à peine de commencer. Il va falloir faire prrreuve de patience pour arriver à tout trier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001150_GRAHATIA<tab>But what brings you to the annex, my friend? Surely you haven't come all this way just to watch us shuffle dusty papers around?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001150_GRAHATIA<tab>Dis-nous, quel bon vent t'amène ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001160_GRAHATIA<tab>The treasure vault of Alzadaal III...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001160_GRAHATIA<tab>Le palais caché du satrrrape de Radz-at-Han, Alzadaal III...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001170_KRILE<tab>And you're looking for companions to join you on this expedition?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001170_KRILE<tab>Tu cherches des compagnons pour t'aider à explorer cet édifice sous-marin, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001180_KRILE<tab>I would dearly love to accompany you, of course, but I'm afraid I'm committed to another task. On the subject of which, I had hoped to ask for your assistance...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001180_KRILE<tab>J'aimerais beaucoup t'accompagner, mais on a déjà requis mes services ailleurs, désolée. À ce propos, j'aurais besoin de ton expertise quand tu auras un moment à me consacrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001190_KRILE<tab>TO BE DELETED
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001190_KRILE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001191_KRILE<tab>Then again, it's not so urgent that it can't wait until you've returned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001191_KRILE<tab>Enfin... Rien d'urgent, pour être honnête. Tu peux toujours revenir me voir une fois que vous en aurez fini de votre côté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001200_KRILE<tab>You should go, Raha. I'll stay here and mind the shop, as it were.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001200_KRILE<tab>Tu n'as qu'à l'accompagner, Raha... Je vais rester ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001210_GRAHATIA<tab>Are you sure? I'd hate to leave you shorthanded...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001210_GRAHATIA<tab>C-c'est vrrrai<var 1D /var>!? Je peux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001220_KRILE<tab>I'm sure. Just try to be back before <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> many moons have passed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001220_KRILE<tab>Bien sûr. Mais n'oublie pas qu'on a encore du pain sur la planche, alors ne traîne pas trop.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001230_GRAHATIA<tab>Well! I guess we're off on another adventure already!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001230_GRAHATIA<tab>Je n'espérrrais pas pouvoir repartir à l'aventure avec toi de sitôt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001240_GRAHATIA<tab>Have you asked anyone else to come along?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001240_GRAHATIA<tab>Qui d'autrrre allons-nous convier à cette petite expédition<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001250_GRAHATIA<tab>Then might I suggest we invite Y'shtola?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001250_GRAHATIA<tab>Eh bien, pourrrquoi ne pas proposer à Y'shtola<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001260_GRAHATIA<tab>Ever since the Scions disbanded, she's spent most of her time cloistered within the Great Gubal Library, hoping to piece together a method to traverse the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001260_GRAHATIA<tab>Depuis la dissolution des Héritiers, elle s'est enferrrmée dans la Grande bibliothèque de Gubal, à la recherche de documents sur le voyage entre les mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001270_GRAHATIA<tab>It would seem, however, that whatever wisdom she sought there was not to be found. She arrived in Sharlayan the other day─we spoke briefly before she began her search of Noumenon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001270_GRAHATIA<tab>Je crois bien qu'elle n'a rrrien trouvé de concluant puisqu'elle est de retour en ville depuis quelque temps. Elle m'a dit qu'elle irait poursuivre ses in<var 16 /var>ves<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>tions au Noumène.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001280_GRAHATIA<tab>Considering what you've told us of Alzadaal's extraordinary feats, I do believe Y'shtola would be more than interested to hear what you have to say.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001280_GRAHATIA<tab>Si les rumeurs à propos d'Alzadaal III sont justes, voilà qui devrait trrrès cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment piquer la curiosité de notre amie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001290_GRAHATIA<tab>Splendid. Then let us head to the archives at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001290_GRAHATIA<tab>Parfait<var 1D /var>! Allons donc la rrretrouver de ce pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001300_KRILE<tab>Wait, before you go─I have another potential member to volunteer, if you've room to spare. Urianger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001300_KRILE<tab>Attendez, tous les deux. Je pense que vous devriez aussi proposer à Urianger de vous accompagner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001310_KRILE<tab>He sent the Students a request for materials, you see─treatises on the architecture of treasure vaults and the like.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001310_KRILE<tab>Il a récemment adressé une missive aux Élèves de Baldesion afin de récolter des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions sur les caches au trésor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001320_KRILE<tab>From what I can gather, the Loporrits are looking to make “improvements” to their own creation, and wish to learn more about how we build things down here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001320_KRILE<tab>J'ai cru comprendre que les Loporrites en ont construit une, mais souhaiteraient l'améliorer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001330_KRILE<tab>From what I can gather, the Loporrits wish to build their own vault for the people of Etheirys to explore, and are looking for inspiration to help make it a “memorable” experience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001330_KRILE<tab>J'ai cru comprendre que les Loporrites aimeraient en construire une.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001340_KRILE<tab>So why not take Urianger with you? Let him study Alzadaal's Legacy firsthand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001340_KRILE<tab>Et donc, je pense qu'il sera très curieux d'aller visiter ce palais sous-marin dont tu nous as parlé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001350_GRAHATIA<tab>None can deny the benefit of seeing something with your own eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001350_GRAHATIA<tab>Pour sûrrr, observer par soi-même est toujours plus instructif que n'importe quel rapport, aussi bien rédigé soit-il.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001360_GRAHATIA<tab>If our expedition leader has no objections, I say we extend Urianger an invitation once we've spoken with Y'shtola.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001360_GRAHATIA<tab>Nous irons le voirrr après être passés chercher Y'shtola.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001370_KRILE<tab>Safe travels, you two. But don't forget: I'd still like your help with that other matter I mentioned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001370_KRILE<tab>Faites attention, tous les deux. Et n'oublie pas que j'ai une autre affaire sur le feu qui nécessite tes talents.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>Right! Then it's off to the library!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>Allez, c'est parrrti<var 1D /var>! Première étape<var 1D /var>: le Noumène<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001390_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001390_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001400_URIANGER<tab>Ah, our illustrious champion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001400_URIANGER<tab>Tiens donc, un autre visage familier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001410_URIANGER<tab>Cloaked in the mantle of the common explorer, fame set aside in thy pursuit of simple adventure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001410_URIANGER<tab>Mes camarades m'ont informé que vous aviez à nouveau enfilé votre tenue d'<var 08 E905 ((aventurière)) ((aventurier)) /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001420_URIANGER<tab>I am told a new expedition is in the offing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001420_URIANGER<tab>Troqué votre vie <var 08 E905 ((d'héroïne)) ((de héros)) /var> pour entamer un nouveau périple...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>'Tis good to see you well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu m'as l'air en pleine forme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wasn't Thancred with you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Thancred est dans les parages<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001430_URIANGER<tab>And thee. As ever, thou art the picture of strength.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001430_URIANGER<tab>En effet. À ce que je vois, vous êtes toujours aussi vaillant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> qu'à l'accoutumée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001440_URIANGER<tab>He left to attend to some personal errand, but should be returning ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001440_URIANGER<tab>Il avait affaire ailleurs, mais il ne devrait pas tarder à rentrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001450_YSHTOLA<tab>You've been keeping yourself busy, I trust?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001450_YSHTOLA<tab>Que deviens-tu depuis que les Héritiers se sont séparés<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001460_URIANGER<tab>True to our plan, Thancred and I embarked upon a pilgrimage of sorts, with an eye for gauging the state of those lands through which we passed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001460_URIANGER<tab>Avec Thancred, nous avons fait le tour de plusieurs contrées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001470_URIANGER<tab>Our travels were interrupted, however, by a request for aid from our befurred lunar allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001470_URIANGER<tab>Mais il y a quelque temps, les Loporrites ont sollicité mon aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001480_URIANGER<tab>As you may recall, the Loporrits had been seeking new purpose for the moon─another role through which it might serve to benefit mankind. The Forum hath been working to advise them in this endeavor, but I returned to offer mine own counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001480_URIANGER<tab>Maintenant qu'elle a perdu son but premier, ils se demandent que faire de la lune. Le Conseil est bien évidemment aussi impliqué dans les discussions, mais nos amis séléniens ont souhaité que je revienne les assister.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001490_GRAHATIA<tab>And this has what to do with treasure vaults exactly...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001490_GRAHATIA<tab>Et en quoi tout ça est lié aux caches au trrrésor<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001500_URIANGER<tab>Ah, you have learned of my predicament from Mistress Krile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001500_URIANGER<tab>Ah, je constate que vous avez discuté avec Krile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001510_URIANGER<tab>I know not whence they acquired such knowledge, but the Loporrits now stand convinced that adventurers delight in treasure hunts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001510_URIANGER<tab>Je ne sais pas où et comment ils l'ont appris, mais les Loporrites sont persuadés que les aventuriers raffolent de cartes au trésor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001520_URIANGER<tab>Thus with their newly built “wonderland of riches and mystery” do they hope to entice all manner of daring delvers to the moon. So earnest and innocent was their desire to bring joy to the world that I found myself powerless to refuse them my cooperation...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001520_URIANGER<tab>Ils souhaitent créer une grande cache sur la lune, et inviter les aventuriers de ce monde à l'explorer. Leur raison d'être étant de combler nos besoins, je ne me voyais pas refuser de leur prêter main-forte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001530_URIANGER<tab>But what of you, my friends? Why are you come to Labyrinthos?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001530_URIANGER<tab>Et vous<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce qui a motivé cette visite impromptue<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001540_URIANGER<tab>Fascinating. This is, indeed, a most fortuitous opportunity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001540_URIANGER<tab>Je vois... C'est en effet une opportunité qui tombe à point nommé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001550_URIANGER<tab>I should be honored to accept thine invitation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001550_URIANGER<tab>Si cela vous convient, je souhaiterais me joindre à mon tour à votre expédition.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001560_URIANGER<tab>How long hath it been, I wonder, when last our actions were not impelled by fate or desperation?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001560_URIANGER<tab>Quand j'y pense, je me demande depuis quand je ne suis pas parti à l'aventure en toute simplicité, sans grande mission à accomplir coûte que coûte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001570_YSHTOLA<tab>Aye, though I cherish the Scions' accomplishments, 'tis pleasant to not have the weight of the world upon our shoulders for a change.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001570_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui, le genre de voyage qui aurait été impossible si nous n'avions pas mis un terme aux Héritiers.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001580_GRAHATIA<tab>Counting Estinien, we number five now, yes? Without knowing what traps or perils await unwary feet, we may be wise to refrain from recruiting others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001580_GRAHATIA<tab>Avec Estinien, nous serons cinq. Je ne sais pas à quoi il faut s'attendrrre sur place, mais je doute que nous ayons besoin d'être plus nombreux que ça.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001590_YSHTOLA<tab>I agree. Between us, we should have the skills to handle whatever situation may arise. Shall we be on our way?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001590_YSHTOLA<tab>Et chacun sait par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment ce qu'il a à faire. Il est temps de se préparer au départ.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001600_THANCRED<tab>What, no time to spare a word for the grizzled old bard?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001600_THANCRED<tab>(-???-)Oh là<var 1D /var>! Me voilà à peine arrivé pour vous saluer et vous partez déjà<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001610_URIANGER<tab>All is well, I trust?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001610_URIANGER<tab>Thancred<var 1D /var>! Vous avez déjà fini<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001620_THANCRED<tab>A wasted trip, I'm afraid. I'd hoped to catch up with a former mentor while you parleyed with the rabbits, but it seems our paths were not to cross.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001620_THANCRED<tab>J'étais parti saluer une vieille con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce pendant que tu étais en discussion avec les Loporrites. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, il n'y avait personne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're looking well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu m'as l'air d'avoir la pêche, dis donc.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>How was your “pilgrimage”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Comment s'est passé le voyage avec Urianger<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001630_THANCRED<tab>That's because we didn't travel by experimental aetheryte. It's astounding what a lack of nausea does for one's sense of well-being.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001630_THANCRED<tab>Tant que je ne voyage pas via éthérite expérimentale, ça va toujours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001640_THANCRED<tab>Having an astrologian beside you on the road is surprisingly convenient. And it doesn't hurt that he's making strides with his light-hearted banter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001640_THANCRED<tab>Naviguer avec quelqu'un qui sait lire dans les étoiles, c'est plutôt rassurant. Et puis, ces derniers temps, il a enfin appris à se dérider un peu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001650_THANCRED<tab>In any case, as we made our way around Ilsabard, we saw that much of the continent was in various stages of chaos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001650_THANCRED<tab>On a traversé le continent d'Ilsabard avant de revenir jusqu'ici. Chaque coin de la planète a ses particularités, mais la confusion règne toujours un peu partout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001660_THANCRED<tab>A certain amount of disorder is to be expected─the Final Days are over, and the people no longer have a common threat binding them together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001660_THANCRED<tab>L'apocalypse avait au moins le mérite de rapprocher les peuples face à une menace commune. Maintenant que tout est terminé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001670_THANCRED<tab>But that's the thing with these fledgling troubles, eh? You need to keep an eye out lest they mature into full-grown headaches.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001670_THANCRED<tab>Enfin, on fait notre possible pour garder l'œil ouvert et éviter que ça dégénère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001680_THANCRED<tab>So. For what reason have so many esteemed personages seen fit to gather?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001680_THANCRED<tab>Et vous alors<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce qui vous amène à Sharlayan<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001690_THANCRED<tab>Beneath the waters of the Bounty, you say? I see you've already stolen away my traveling partner with the promise of unexplored ruins and scholarly glory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001690_THANCRED<tab>Hmm... Un palais au trésor situé au fin fond de la mer de l'Abondance... Et donc vous êtes venus vous attribuer les services du grand astromancien Urianger en personne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001700_URIANGER<tab>Nay, 'tis not for mine own indulgence, but rather the fulfillment of my commitment to the Loporrits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001700_URIANGER<tab>À vrai dire, je me suis joint à eux au nom des Loporrites, mes véritables employeurs. Dans un sens, je suis un peu leur sous-traitant dans cette expédition.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001710_THANCRED<tab>Ah, of course... And if you have Estinien rounding out your group, you likely have all the members you need.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001710_THANCRED<tab>Puisque Estinien sera à vos côtés, vous devriez vous en sortir sans moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001720_YSHTOLA<tab>Feeling left out? I could put in a good word for you, if you like.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001720_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh si tu te sens seul, je veux bien te demander of<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ciel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment de nous accompagner, tu sais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001730_THANCRED<tab>We may have been “released” from our obligations, but I'll never be free of that merciless wit of yours, will I?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001730_THANCRED<tab>Même après notre séparation, je vois que notre sorcière n'a rien perdu de sa verve...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001740_THANCRED<tab>In all seriousness, 'tis best I sit this one out. Too many former Scions consorting with one another might be seen as a cause for concern in certain quarters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001740_THANCRED<tab>Toutefois, si tous les anciens Héritiers se regroupent pour partir en expédition, cela risque de soulever de nombreuses questions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001750_THANCRED<tab>I'll return to my usual reconnaissance, and scout out the situation in the Far East. Feel free to share if you come across any interesting revelations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001750_THANCRED<tab>Je ferai cavalier seul, comme à mon habitude. J'ai prévu d'aller faire un tour en Orient, mais n'hésitez pas à me faire signe si vous avez besoin de moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001760_THANCRED<tab>Till we meet again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001760_THANCRED<tab>À la revoyure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001770_URIANGER<tab>Shall we also hasten our departure? Ser Estinien will wonder what hath become of us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001770_URIANGER<tab>Bon, je crois que nous pouvons y aller. Estinien nous attend à Akyaali, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001780_GRAHATIA<tab>What have we here...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001780_GRAHATIA<tab>Qu'est-ce que c'est...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001790_URIANGER<tab>'Tis not unlike a Hannish alchemical furnace in design...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001790_URIANGER<tab>Cela ressemble aux fourneaux des alchimistes de Radz-at-Han...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001800_YSHTOLA<tab>Well, there is one way we might find out...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001800_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais difficile d'en dire plus sans l'inspecter plus précisément.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001810_VARSHAHN<tab>Stop! You mustn't touch it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001810_VARSHAHN<tab>(-???-)Attendez<var 1D /var>! Ne touchez pas à ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001820_GRAHATIA<tab>Vrtra... Ah, my apologies. Should I continue calling you “Varshahn”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001820_GRAHATIA<tab>Vrtra<var 1D /var>!? Ou devrrrais-je dire Varshahn... Que faites-vous donc ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001830_VARSHAHN<tab>You may address me as you wish. My nature is no longer a secret.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001830_VARSHAHN<tab>Vous pouvez m'appeler par mon véritable nom. Je n'ai plus besoin de vivre dans l'ombre désormais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001840_VARSHAHN<tab>Still, this is not the setting I imagined for our reunion. Surely you've not entered these ruins as common looters...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001840_VARSHAHN<tab>Jamais je n'aurais imaginé que nos retrouvailles auraient lieu dans ce palais. Rassurez-moi, vous n'êtes pas venus le piller, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001850_ESTINIEN<tab>Would that we could deny your accusations...but I fear you're not far from the truth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001850_ESTINIEN<tab>“Piller” est un bien vilain mot, mais je dois avouer que ça m'a traversé l'esprit...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001860_URIANGER<tab>Great Vrtra. Might we beseech thee to explain the nature of this strange contrivance?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001860_URIANGER<tab>Honorable Vrtra... Pourriez-vous nous en dire plus sur ce dispositif, au fond de la pièce<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001870_VARSHAHN<tab>It was crafted by our alchemists at my behest. For the purpose of...sealing something away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001870_VARSHAHN<tab>C'est moi... qui ai jadis demandé à mes alchimistes de le construire. Son but est de sceller ce qu'il renferme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sealing away what, exactly?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>“Ce qu'il renferme”<var 1D /var>? C'est-à-dire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I wasn't going to touch it, but you know Y'shtola...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Moi je ne voulais pas y toucher, mais Y'shtola n'en fait qu'à sa tête...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001880_YSHTOLA<tab>You and I will speak later.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001880_YSHTOLA<tab>Toi, j'aurai deux mots à te dire quand on sera sortis d'ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001890_GRAHATIA<tab>Not the time for frivolity, my friend, not the time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001890_GRAHATIA<tab>Hé, vous deux<var 1D /var>! C'est pas le moment de plaisanter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001900_URIANGER<tab>This “something” of which thou speakest... Might it be some manner of threat?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001900_URIANGER<tab>Qu'avez-vous donc enfermé à l'intérieur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001910_URIANGER<tab>This “something” of which thou speakest... Might it be some manner of threat?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001910_URIANGER<tab>Qu'avez-vous donc enfermé à l'intérieur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001920_VARSHAHN<tab>Perhaps I should simply show you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001920_VARSHAHN<tab>Vous allez le savoir tout de suite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001930_VARSHAHN<tab>I have lifted the seal, if only for the moment. By an authority only I possess.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001930_VARSHAHN<tab>Grâce à mon pouvoir unique, je peux temporairement lever le sceau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001940_URIANGER<tab>A planar fissure!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001940_URIANGER<tab>C'est... une fissure du néant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001950_GRAHATIA<tab>No, my friend... Small though it may be, this is a functioning gate into the void!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001950_GRAHATIA<tab>Non... Je pense même qu'il s'agit d'une vérrritable porte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001960_YSHTOLA<tab>I must admit, I am deathly curious to know how a voidgate came to be hidden in the depths of these ruins.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001960_YSHTOLA<tab>Pourriez-vous nous expliquer en détail comment cette porte du néant s'est retrouvée ici, scellée dans cet appareil<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001970_VARSHAHN<tab>To tell that tale, we must first peer far to the south, and even further into memory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001970_VARSHAHN<tab>Pour que vous puissiez tout comprendre, il me faut d'abord vous conter des événements survenus il y a fort longtemps, très loin au sud d'ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001980_VARSHAHN<tab>An age five millennia past, when the Allagan Empire sent an invading force to the shores of Meracydia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001980_VARSHAHN<tab>C'était il y a plus de cinq mille ans... Lorsque l'empire d'Allag entama son invasion du continent de Méracydia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001990_VARSHAHN<tab>The southern people rallied around the commanding figures of Bahamut and Tiamat, and fought fiercely to repel the would-be conquerors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_001990_VARSHAHN<tab>Face aux troupes ennemies, les Méracydiens s'étaient rassemblés sous l'égide des deux grands dragons anciens Bahamut et Tiamat, et résistaient farouchement à l'envahisseur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002000_VARSHAHN<tab>With Bahamut's defeat, however, the tide turned against them. Desperate to seize any advantage, the Meracydians resorted to summoning primal entities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002000_VARSHAHN<tab>Mais lorsque Bahamut fut vaincu, l'équilibre des forces se brisa, et les Méracydiens se tournèrent vers l'invocation de Primordiaux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002010_VARSHAHN<tab>In response, Emperor Xande forged a covenant with the Cloud of Darkness, sovereign among the all-devouring denizens of the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002010_VARSHAHN<tab>Pour contrer ces créatures, l'empereur d'Allag, Xande, forma un pacte avec l'un des maîtres du néant, l'être connu sous le nom de Nuage de Ténèbres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002020_VARSHAHN<tab>Thus bolstered by eikons on one side and voidsent on the other, the two armies clashed in a battle of unspeakable carnage. So much death. So much loss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002020_VARSHAHN<tab>Épaulés respectivement par les Primordiaux et les créatures du néant, les Méracydiens et les Allagois croisèrent le fer au cours d'une bataille dont l'atrocité est restée dans les annales.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002030_GRAHATIA<tab>I consider myself well versed in that period of history, yet you speak as one who witnessed it happen...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002030_GRAHATIA<tab>Nous disposons de nombreuses sources relatant ce moment de l'Histoirrre... Cependant, à vous entendre, on jurerait que vous y étiez en chair et en os.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002040_VARSHAHN<tab>Indeed I did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002040_VARSHAHN<tab>En effet, j'ai tout vu de mes propres yeux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002050_VARSHAHN<tab>I heard Tiamat's roar of defiance, and sped toward that war-torn land...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002050_VARSHAHN<tab>Après avoir perçu l'effroyable cri de Tiamat ralliant ses enfants, nous nous sommes rendus sur place...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002060_VARSHAHN<tab>...along with my sibling, Azdaja.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002060_VARSHAHN<tab>Moi et ma sœur aînée, Azdaja.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002070_VARSHAHN<tab>We dragons are not “male” or “female” as men are wont to classify, but “elder sister” is the closest a mortal tongue can come to describing what she meant to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002070_VARSHAHN<tab>En vérité, nous autres dragons ne différencions pas les sexes comme vous, les humains... Mais pour vous aider à comprendre notre relation, le terme de “grande sœur” me semble le plus approprié.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002080_VARSHAHN<tab>I was the last of our brood to hatch, and Azdaja cared for me where my sire could not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002080_VARSHAHN<tab>Comme j'étais le dernier œuf de la portée à éclore, elle s'est occupée de moi comme l'aurait fait un parent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002090_VARSHAHN<tab>Thus I was with her when Tiamat roared. I was with her when she journeyed south. And I was with her when she fought against the voidsent hordes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002090_VARSHAHN<tab>Voilà pourquoi nous étions ensemble lorsque résonna le cri de Tiamat. Nous avons ensuite volé jusqu'à Méracydia, et pris part au combat contre l'armée du néant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002100_VARSHAHN<tab>Yet no matter how many of their vile fiends we cast down, more rose from the abyss to take their place. Faced with an unwinnable war of attrition, Azdaja risked her all on a final gamble...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002100_VARSHAHN<tab>Mais plus nous pourfendions de créatures, plus leurs semblables les remplaçaient à l'infini... Notre endurance étant mise à rude épreuve, Azdaja décida de jouer le tout pour le tout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002110_VARSHAHN<tab>She plunged through the voidgate itself to strike at the root of their strength.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002110_VARSHAHN<tab>Elle s'est engouffrée dans une porte du néant, afin d'affronter la source de cette gigantesque armée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002120_VARSHAHN<tab>I tried to follow in her wake, determined to lend what aid I could...but even as I came upon Allag's glittering tower, I saw the rift close behind her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002120_VARSHAHN<tab>Voulant la suivre, je me suis dirigé vers la base allagoise et sa Tour de Cristal si distincte... mais la porte s'est refermée devant moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002130_VARSHAHN<tab>And Azdaja has been lost to us ever since.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002130_VARSHAHN<tab>Et depuis, je n'ai jamais revu Azdaja...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002140_GRAHATIA<tab>I find I must retract my earlier claim of historical knowledge─nowhere in the Crystal Tower's archives did I see mention of such noble sacrifice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002140_GRAHATIA<tab>J'ai été assez prrrésomptueux sur ma con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce de l'Histoire... Aucun des rapports disponibles dans la Tour ne fait état de cet événement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002150_VARSHAHN<tab>That does not surprise me. To Allagan eyes, it must have seemed as if a lone dragon, driven to madness, simply dove through the gate and did not return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002150_VARSHAHN<tab>Du point de vue allagois, il ne s'agissait sûrement que d'un détail. Peu leur importait qu'un dragon à l'agonie se soit jeté dans la porte du néant pour ne jamais en revenir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002160_VARSHAHN<tab>For my part, I spent long years searching for the means to reunite with Azdaja...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002160_VARSHAHN<tab>Par la suite, j'ai longuement cherché le moyen de remonter la piste d'Azdaja.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002170_VARSHAHN<tab>Until I could search no more─until Allag was dust, and the arts to open a voidgate large enough to accommodate a dragon forever lost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002170_VARSHAHN<tab>Mais avec le déclin de l'empire allagois, les con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces nécessaires à la création d'une porte suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment grande pour laisser passer un dragon ont été perdues... Et je n'avais plus aucun moyen de retrouver ma sœur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002180_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet you have the beginnings of a gate right here, under the control of a Hannish device.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002180_YSHTOLA<tab>Pourtant, c'est bien l'une de ces portes qui se trouve dans ce dispositif. Selon vous, il a été créé par des alchimistes de Radz-at-Han, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002190_VARSHAHN<tab>My discovery came before Radz-at-Han was founded. Though I scoured the lands for a method to cross the rift, it was beneath the sea that I chanced to find a natural planar fissure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002190_VARSHAHN<tab>C'était bien avant que la cité ne soit établie. Voulant dé<var 16 /var>ses<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ré<var 16 /var>ment retrouver Azdaja, j'ai fini par découvrir, au fond de la mer de l'Abondance, une fissure naturelle menant au néant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002200_VARSHAHN<tab>It was, however, far too narrow to admit a wyrm's bulk. Only after our city rose upon the rock, and I could enlist the aid of our talented alchemists, did matters take a favorable turn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002200_VARSHAHN<tab>Mais mon enveloppe charnelle bien trop imposante ne pouvait pas la traverser. C'est alors que les alchimistes de la future Radz-at-Han me sont venus en aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002210_VARSHAHN<tab>Their dedication was beyond reproach. Tirelessly they worked to expand the fissure, and after decades of toil, it finally grew to a size that a child might pass through...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002210_VARSHAHN<tab>Ils n'ont pas lésiné sur leurs efforts pour trouver une solution. Au bout de plusieurs décennies, ils réussirent à agrandir la brèche, suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment pour qu'un de mes pantins puisse passer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002220_ESTINIEN<tab>Not long ago, you told us that you called out to your kin; that Azdaja's answer was silence. I suspect the conclusion to your tale is not a joyful one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002220_ESTINIEN<tab>Ça me revient maintenant. Quand tu as cherché à obtenir des écailles pour nous permettre de voyager dans l'espace, tu as dit qu'Azdaja n'avait pas répondu à ton appel...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002230_VARSHAHN<tab>With hope in my heart, I used a simulacrum to cross the threshold...but no─I did not find her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002230_VARSHAHN<tab>J'ai utilisé un de mes pantins pour me rendre dans le néant... Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je n'ai pas réussi à retrouver ma sœur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002240_VARSHAHN<tab>What I found was a host of voidsent, clamoring around the opening they had sensed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002240_VARSHAHN<tab>Lorsque j'ai franchi la porte, j'ai été accueilli par un groupe de créatures, attirées par l'ouverture du passage...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002250_VARSHAHN<tab>'Twas but a moment, but enough. I had no choice but to retreat and allow the portal to contract once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002250_VARSHAHN<tab>Je n'ai pas eu d'autre choix que de rebrousser chemin et revenir dans ce monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002260_ESTINIEN<tab>The gate was a threat to your people. You had to decide between endangering Radz-at-Han, and abandoning your sister... And you chose the latter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002260_ESTINIEN<tab>Le risque pour les habitants de Radz-at-Han étant trop élevé, tu as décidé d'abandonner les recherches et de sceller la porte afin de les protéger, c'est bien ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002270_URIANGER<tab>'Twas not that thy sibling scorned thy call; 'twas that she was trapped beyond a barrier through which neither roar nor dragon may pass. Even now, in the desolate world of the Thirteenth...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002270_URIANGER<tab>Il est probable qu'Azdaja n'ait simplement pas entendu votre appel, et qu'elle se trouve toujours quelque part de l'autre côté... Dans le treizième reflet...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002280_GRAHATIA<tab>I can scarce imagine your pain, yet it was wise not to linger in that place. Too long a sojourn, and even a being of your power risks being warped into a creature of the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002280_GRAHATIA<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, vous avez eu rrraison de revenir au plus vite. Même votre pouvoir de dragon ancien ne peut vous protéger totalement du néant. Vous aussi, vous auriez fini par vous transformer en créature après un certain temps dans le Monde des Ténèbres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002290_GRAHATIA<tab>You've seen this phenomenon before, when we stepped into the darkness...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002290_GRAHATIA<tab>Toi-même, tu as déjà fait l'expérrrience de ces lieux maudits, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Aye, I thought our time had come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'ai cru que j'allais y rester<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I remember when Nero turned purple...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ah oui, c'est quand Nero s'est retrouvé tout violet...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A10_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002300_GRAHATIA<tab>As did I. Were it not for Unei and Doga─or Nero, for that matter─we might never have made it home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002300_GRAHATIA<tab>On est pas passés loin, en effet. Sans l'aide d'Unéi, de Doga et même de Nero, nous n'aurions jamais pu en sortirrr indemnes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002310_GRAHATIA<tab>Do you remember what happened to Nero? How his wounds allowed the void's corruption to enter his body and twist his aether?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002310_GRAHATIA<tab>Rappelle-toi ce qui est arrivé à Nero d'ailleurs. À cause d'une blessure, son éther a été totalement déréglé, entraînant des transformations de son corrrps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002320_GRAHATIA<tab>Turn purple? Well, yes, his wounds had allowed the void's corruption to enter his body and twist his aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002320_GRAHATIA<tab>Oui, mais ce n'est pas là où je voulais en venir... Tu te rappelles qu'à cause d'une blessure, son éther a été totalement déréglé, entraînant des transformations de son corrrps<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002330_GRAHATIA<tab>Remember well what happened to Nero, when his wounds allowed the void's corruption to enter his body and twist his aether...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002330_GRAHATIA<tab>Tu te rappelles ce qui est arrivé à Nero<var 1D /var>? À cause d'une blessure, son éther a été totalement déréglé, entraînant des transformations de son corrrps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002340_GRAHATIA<tab>Had it been allowed to progress much longer, I presume he would've been fully transformed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002340_GRAHATIA<tab>Plus on passe de temps dans ce reflet, plus la probabilité de se trrransformer en créature du néant augmente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002350_VARSHAHN<tab>Then there is little hope for Azdaja...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002350_VARSHAHN<tab>Ça veut dire que ma sœur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002360_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, no, I hadn't meant to─ I speak only of possibilities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002360_GRAHATIA<tab>Oh, euh... Parrrdonnez-moi. Cela reste une théorie avant tout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002370_GRAHATIA<tab>The scales of the first brood are extraordinarily resistant to aetherial fluctuations. They are the protective talismans' core components, after all, and even the corruption I described would struggle to overcome─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002370_GRAHATIA<tab>Les écailles des dragons anciens offrent une grrrande protection contre les variations d'éther. Je doute qu'Azdaja ait pu se transformer si facilement...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002380_GRAHATIA<tab>Of course. With a warding scale in one's possession, one could conceivably survive a stay in the Thirteenth without being warped by its energies...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002380_GRAHATIA<tab>Mais au fait... Nous pourrions utiliser les amulettes garde-âme pour nous protéger des effets néfastes du néant et voyager dans le treizième reflet sans crrraindre de nous changer en créature.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002390_VARSHAHN<tab>Be that as it may, it is too late to rescue my sister. Five thousand years too late.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002390_VARSHAHN<tab>C'est de l'histoire ancienne. Voilà plus de cinq mille ans que ma sœur a disparu dans cet autre monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002400_VARSHAHN<tab>And now, countless others look to me for guidance and protection.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002400_VARSHAHN<tab>De plus... J'ai avant tout le devoir de protéger mon peuple.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002410_VARSHAHN<tab>So when I sensed intruders in the ruins, I came only to ensure that the gate remain closed. That, and to secure the treasure, of course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002410_VARSHAHN<tab>Si je suis ici, c'est simplement pour empêcher des curieux d'ouvrir la porte du néant par inadvertance. Ou de partir avec le trésor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002420_VARSHAHN<tab>I wish only to forget the rest...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002420_VARSHAHN<tab>J'ai bien essayé de l'effacer de ma mémoire, mais son souvenir est toujours vivace...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002430_VRITRA<tab>I thank you for your attendance.
