target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002430_VRITRA<tab>Mes amis, merci à tous pour votre présence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002440_VRITRA<tab>The riches the Radiant Host have retrieved were hoarded in Alzadaal's name─a fortune I set aside for a future day of need.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002440_VRITRA<tab>J'ai demandé aux soldats de l'Ost rayonnant de rapatrier le “trésor d'Alzadaal”. Comme je vous l'ai expliqué, il s'agit en réalité d'un pécule que j'avais ordonné de constituer en cas de besoin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002450_VRITRA<tab>And lo, that day hath come. May it aid our wounded city in reclaiming its vibrancy and vigor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002450_VRITRA<tab>Un besoin qui est plus que jamais palpable aujourd'hui. Notre chatoyante cité a été ternie par l'apocalypse... Servons-nous de ces richesses pour lui rendre ses couleurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002460_VRITRA<tab>In better times, I would leave such a task to our capable Ahewann, gods rest his soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002460_VRITRA<tab>Jusqu'alors, je confiais la réalisation des œuvres humanitaires à mes satrapes. Dommage que je ne puisse plus compter sur l'abnégation de notre regretté Ahewann...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002470_VRITRA<tab>Finding myself bereft of his counsel in the here and now, I will assume the responsibilities of mine office directly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002470_VRITRA<tab>Qu'à cela ne tienne. À compter de maintenant, c'est moi qui endosserai le rôle de satrape et donnerai les ordres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002480_VRITRA<tab>Firstly, the treasure shall be sold for more convenient currency, thence invested into the trading port of Yedlihmad. Our merchants must have their operations restored, their ships rebuilt. Commerce must flow once more!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002480_VRITRA<tab>Nous allons en premier lieu liquider le trésor d'Alzadaal, puis nous réinvestirons l'argent obtenu dans les marchés de Yedlihmad. Ainsi nous épaulerons les commerçants qui ont perdu leurs employés ou leurs bateaux, et nous encouragerons la reprise des affaires.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002490_VRITRA<tab>None were spared the tragedy of the Final Days─of this I am well aware.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002490_VRITRA<tab>Évidemment, ils ne sont pas les seules victimes de la tragédie, et j'ai par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment conscience du fait que bien d'autres sinistrés auraient besoin d'un coup de pouce.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002500_VRITRA<tab>But an absence was created by the loss of Khalzahl's consortium, and by filling it, we provide new means for our fishermen, our artisans, and others to bring their wares to distant markets.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002500_VRITRA<tab>Si je fais le choix de soutenir l'économie locale, c'est pour venir indirectement en aide aux pêcheurs, artisans et maçons qui ont perdu l'un de leurs plus gros clients, à savoir Khalzahl.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002510_ESTINIEN<tab>And what of the children who were left without family to care for them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002510_ESTINIEN<tab>Et qu'as-tu prévu pour tous ces enfants que la catastrophe a rendus orphelins<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002520_VRITRA<tab>That is a concern which weigheth heavily upon my mind. A simple gift of coin will soon be exhausted, leaving these young souls adrift on the fringes of our society.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002520_VRITRA<tab>C'est un problème épineux auquel je n'ai pas encore trouvé de solution. Nous pourrions subvenir à leurs besoins moyennant finance, mais cela ne durerait qu'un temps, et ils se retrouveraient bien vite à vagabonder de nouveau...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002530_VRITRA<tab>Nay, a proper solution is needed, one which doth guarantee their welfare for years to come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002530_VRITRA<tab>Si nous voulons durablement les protéger, des mesures fortes s'imposent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002540_VRITRA<tab>Thou hast surely seen how other nations rise to meet this challenge, adventurer. What dost thou deem the wisest course?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002540_VRITRA<tab>J'aimerais d'ailleurs avoir ton avis sur la question, <var 08 E905 ((aventurière)) ((aventurier)) /var>... Toi qui as visité de nombreuses contrées sinistrées, que me conseillerais-tu de faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Taxes. Levy them on trade profits in exchange for your investment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous pourriez collecter une taxe sur les échanges commerciaux, après les avoir promus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It takes a village...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Cultivez un esprit de solidarité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Idyllshire's orphanage was funded through trade in highly coveted goods...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Inspirez-vous de l'orphelinat d'Idyllée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Firmament's orphanage was built as part of a communal restoration effort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A11_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>Inspirez-vous de l'orphelinat d'Azurée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002550_VRITRA<tab>I see... We create a reliable source of revenue.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002550_VRITRA<tab>Ma foi... Voilà une proposition tout à fait pertinente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002560_VRITRA<tab>Of course... We must all look out for one another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002560_VRITRA<tab>Si ceux qui reçoivent de l'aide pouvaient tendre à leur tour la main à d'autres personnes... ce serait formidable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002570_VRITRA<tab>Of course... We can draw on trading profits to build a new institution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002570_VRITRA<tab>Ainsi cette Rowena a financé à travers son entreprise la con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion d'un orphelinat... Bel exemple à suivre, en effet<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002580_VRITRA<tab>Of course... The revival of trade can contribute to the building of a new institution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002580_VRITRA<tab>Ainsi un orphelinat a vu le jour dans le cadre de la recon<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion d'Azurée... Très intéressant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002590_VRITRA<tab>Let us put this idea into practice. A contract shall be written, requiring all who receive of Alzadaal's treasure to commit a portion of their future earnings towards the running of an orphanage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002590_VRITRA<tab>Tu viens de me donner une excellente idée. En échange de notre apport financier, je demanderai contrac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment aux marchands de réinvestir une partie de leurs profits dans la gestion d'un orphelinat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002600_VRITRA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002600_VRITRA<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002610_VRITRA<tab>Now, such an influential policy is deserving of a worthy name...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002610_VRITRA<tab>Il ne nous reste plus qu'à baptiser cette initiative comme il se doit...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Something with “Khalzahl” seems appropriate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Et si vous rendiez hommage à Khalzahl<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why not honor one of your most successful merchants?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Et si vous empruntiez le nom d'un célèbre marchand<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002620_VRITRA<tab>Ah, a fitting candidate...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002620_VRITRA<tab>Rendre hommage à Khalzahl<var 1D /var>? Oh, je vois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002630_VRITRA<tab>A successful merchant...? Ah, I believe I see thy reasoning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002630_VRITRA<tab>Le nom d'un marchand<var 1D /var>? Oh, tu fais sans doute allusion à Khalzahl...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002640_VRITRA<tab>Khalzahl should be remembered not as the blasphemy which terrorized Thavnair, but as a hardworking and generous man who brought much wealth to our shores.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002640_VRITRA<tab>Il s'agirait d'honorer le grand homme d'affaires de Radz-at-Han, et non l'Hérésiarque de Thavnair... de redorer son blason, en quelque sorte...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002650_VRITRA<tab>Do any among you object to this proposition? Many here lost loved ones to the beasts...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002650_VRITRA<tab>Per<var 16 /var>son<var 16 /var>nel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment, je n'y vois aucun inconvénient. Seulement, beaucoup d'entre vous ont perdu des proches par sa faute, aussi je comprendrais que vous ayez des réserves à cet égard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002660_NAHBDEEN<tab>In that time of strife, any one of us could have broken. Any one of us may have been taken by despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002660_NAHBDEEN<tab>L'apocalypse nous a tous bouleversés d'une façon ou d'une autre. De fait, n'importe lequel d'entre nous aurait pu céder à la peur et se transformer en monstre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002670_NAHBDEEN<tab>When I think of Khalzahl, I feel no hatred...only a stinging regret that we could not save him as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002670_NAHBDEEN<tab>Il a fallu que Khalzahl soit l'une des premières victimes... et je m'en veux de ne pas avoir pu le sauver... mais ce coup du sort n'a en rien entamé l'estime que je lui portais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002680_NAHBDEEN<tab>Isn't that right, men!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002680_NAHBDEEN<tab>Vous êtes tous d'accord avec moi, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002690_ESTINIEN<tab>This bodes well for that boy─“Mehrahd,” was it? Perhaps he can cut ties with that shady peddler.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002690_ESTINIEN<tab>C'est l'autre moucheron qui va être content... Enfin je veux dire, Mehrahd. Avec ça, j'imagine qu'il n'aura plus à tremper dans de sales combines.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002700_VRITRA<tab>Then let it be done. Henceforth, this initiative shall be known as the “Khalzahl Foundation”!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002700_VRITRA<tab>Puisqu'il n'y a pas d'objection, je vous annonce dès à présent la création du fonds Khalzahl<var 1D /var>! Plus vite nous concrétiserons nos plans, mieux ce sera, alors au travail<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002710_VRITRA<tab>Nahbdeen, thou art to assemble a patrol, and ensure that no child in this city liveth in squalor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002710_VRITRA<tab>Nahbdeen, rassemble tes hommes. Allez patrouiller en ville, et prêtez une attention toute par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>re aux orphelins que vous croiserez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002720_VRITRA<tab>Clerks! See to the management of our funds and make haste! Our citizens must not suffer a day more than is necessary!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002720_VRITRA<tab>Quant à mes dévoués serviteurs, je vous charge de mettre sur pied le fonds Khalzahl<var 1D /var>! Faites vite, les indigents comptent sur nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002730_ESTINIEN<tab>Dragon and man, side by side in pursuit of a brighter morrow. I'm reminded of Ishgard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002730_ESTINIEN<tab>Un dragon et des humains qui s'unissent face à l'adversité... Ça rappelle des souvenirs, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002740_YSHTOLA<tab>Right─here we all are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002740_YSHTOLA<tab>Merci d'avoir répondu à mon appel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>You discovered something new?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>Que se passe-t-il<var 1D /var>? Tu as fait des découvertes in<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>res<var 16 /var>santes<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002760_YSHTOLA<tab>I took a closer look at that device. I was able to determine how it keeps the voidgate sealed, but not how it might instead be employed to expand the opening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002760_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui et non. J'ai passé l'enceinte de confinement à la loupe, et j'ai pu élucider le mécanisme scellant la porte du néant... mais pas celui permettant son agrandissement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002770_YSHTOLA<tab>For that, I would need to reference the technique developed by Vrtra's alchemists─no records of which appear to have survived the intervening years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002770_YSHTOLA<tab>Pour cela, il faudrait selon Vrtra se pencher sur la méthode employée par les alchimistes d'antan. Seulement, ce savoir-faire s'est perdu avec le temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002780_ESTINIEN<tab>We know this, so why have you sent for us? Have you learned aught of value or not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002780_ESTINIEN<tab>Tu ne nous as quand même pas fait venir jusqu'ici pour nous répéter ce que l'on sait déjà<var 1D /var>? Qu'en est-il du voyage entre les mondes<var 1D /var>? As-tu la moindre piste qu'on pourrait exploiter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002790_YSHTOLA<tab>Patience, good ser─one must introduce the subject before launching into specifics.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002790_YSHTOLA<tab>J'allais justement y venir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002800_YSHTOLA<tab>From what we understand, travel between worlds is accomplished by passing through the nebulous rift which exists between them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002800_YSHTOLA<tab>D'abord, il faut savoir que passer d'un monde à un autre implique forcément de traverser l'interstice dimensionnel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002810_YSHTOLA<tab>Picture, if you will, the moment you were called to the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002810_YSHTOLA<tab>Souviens-toi, lorsque tu as voyagé vers le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002820_YSHTOLA<tab>You touched a focus of some kind to help the Exarch pinpoint your location. His summoning spell then channeled the energies of the Crystal Tower to begin your journey to his world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002820_YSHTOLA<tab>C'était l'exarque qui t'avait appelé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Il s'était servi du pouvoir de la Tour de Cristal pour lancer un sort d'invocation<var 1D /var>; et j'imagine que de ton côté, tu as dû toucher une sorte de dispositif déclencheur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002830_YSHTOLA<tab>The magicks tore a hole in the wall separating Source and shard, and cast you into the intervening nothingness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002830_YSHTOLA<tab>Ce faisant, tu as ouvert un orifice dans la paroi qui sépare les mondes, et tu es passé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à travers, tombant dans l'interstice dimensionnel...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002840_YSHTOLA<tab>In that place, the laws of nature hold no sway...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002840_YSHTOLA<tab>Interstice qui, comme son nom l'indique, est un espace entièrement distinct des autres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002850_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet even through this realm of temporal and spatial instability, you were borne safely to your destination in the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002850_YSHTOLA<tab>Dans un second temps, tu es parvenu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à t'en extirper pour enfin atterrir dans le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>The feat that guided you across such an unimaginable distance─both physical and metaphorical─was nothing short of a miracle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu as été guidé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> d'un monde à l'autre, ce qui t'a permis de garder le cap dans les méandres spatio-temporels qui les séparent. C'est un véritable tour de force, quand on y pense.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002870_ESTINIEN<tab>Then what of the many voidsent found in the Source? Who guides them here, and how?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002870_ESTINIEN<tab>Mais alors, qu'en est-il des créatures du néant qui font irruption dans le monde primitif<var 1D /var>? Sont-elles également guidées par une main invisible<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>An excellent question.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>Excellente question.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>Though there are several methods by which the void's denizens might intrude upon our world, the rituals of summoning are the most typical.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>En soi, les invocations de créatures du néant sont une parfaite illustration de ce mécanisme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>For example, let us consider the gargoyle─a creature of middling power.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>Laissez-moi vous expliquer. Prenons par exemple des entités de rang intermédiaire. Disons des gargouilles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>To call upon such an entity, the prospective summoner must force open a voidgate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>Ceux qui cherchent à les invoquer vont lancer le sort idoine, et ouvrir momentanément de petites portes du néant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>The portal lasts but a moment and is relatively small, allowing only an imp or other lesser being to squeeze through with their physical body intact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Des créatures de faible rang comme des imps pourraient passer à travers et arriver dans le monde primitif en conservant leur enveloppe corporelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>Our more powerful gargoyle, however, is too large for that. Creating a gate big enough for him would require vast amounts of energy─far beyond the reserves of any one mortal practitioner.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>Or, ce serait plus compliqué dans le cas de nos gargouilles. Leurs invocateurs devraient en théorie ouvrir des portes de grande taille, et consommer pour cela plus d'éther qu'ils n'en possèdent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002940_YSHTOLA<tab>Instead, 'tis far more common to bring over only the entity's soul. We had a taste of that ourselves when a certain Exarch dragged us to the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002940_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est pourquoi en pratique, ces rituels s'attachent uniquement à transporter les âmes des entités cibles. Rappelez-vous notamment ce qu'il s'est passé lorsque l'exarque nous a conduits dans le premier reflet...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>And just as our bodies remained in our world, the voidsent's physical form is left behind in the Thirteenth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>Évidemment, cela implique que les corps des créatures restent à quai, dans le treizième reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002960_YSHTOLA<tab>Once at its destination, the summoned soul is granted a temporary shell to inhabit. In the gargoyle's case, a stone effigy has proven a suitable vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002960_YSHTOLA<tab>Pour qu'elles puissent évoluer dans le monde primitif, il convient alors de loger leurs âmes dans des enveloppes provisoires – par exemple, des statues de pierre pour les gargouilles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002970_ESTINIEN<tab>Wait─you said that voidsent must be called here deliberately by someone in the Source─reeled in like a fisherman with his catch?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002970_ESTINIEN<tab>Je vois. Donc, toutes les créatures du néant qu'on croise dans le monde primitif y sont parce que quelqu'un les y a invitées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>Exactly. For a being to navigate the chaos of the rift, with or without form, there must needs be a guiding agent on the other side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est ma conclusion. Pour qu'elles puissent effectuer sans encombre un saut dimensionnel et bénéficier d'un corps à l'arrivée, la présence d'une main directrice est in<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>pen<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002990_VARSHAHN<tab>When the hordes poured forth from Allag's great gate, it was the technologists who drew them through.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_002990_VARSHAHN<tab>Je m'en souviens, les légions démoniaques que nous avons affrontées jadis avaient surgi d'une porte ouverte par les Allagois. Ils comptaient sans doute dans leurs rangs des magismologues dont le rôle était de guider les monstres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003000_VARSHAHN<tab>Though to my knowledge, planar fissures are, in essence, natural passages between our world and the void, which require no such guidance to traverse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003000_VARSHAHN<tab>Cela dit, comment expliques-tu alors ces fissures du néant qui naissent spontanément<var 1D /var>? Elles ne doivent leur existence à aucune in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion humaine, et relient pourtant bel et bien deux mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003010_VARSHAHN<tab>Why is only the boundary between the Source and the Thirteenth so fragile? So much so that it often tears open of its own accord...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003010_VARSHAHN<tab>D'ailleurs, pourquoi ne se forment-elles qu'en regard du treizième reflet<var 1D /var>? D'où vient cette apparente porosité dimensionnelle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003020_YSHTOLA<tab>I believe solving that mystery is key to understanding travel between the Source and its reflections.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003020_YSHTOLA<tab>... Si j'avais les réponses à ces questions, le voyage entre les mondes serait sans doute à ma portée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003030_ESTINIEN<tab>And how do you intend to get your answers?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003030_ESTINIEN<tab>Hm hm. Et tu saurais où les trouver, ces fameuses réponses<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003040_VARSHAHN<tab>...No, the danger is too great!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003040_VARSHAHN<tab>Non... Tu n'y penses pas...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003050_YSHTOLA<tab>Perhaps. But what some call “danger,” others think of as “adventure.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003050_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh que si<var 1D /var>! Tant qu'à vivre une nouvelle aventure, autant qu'elle soit audacieuse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003060_VARSHAHN<tab>Were you not listening to my tale? Never mind that the means to expand the gate has been lost to the ages.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003060_VARSHAHN<tab>N'as-tu pas écouté mes précédentes ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions<var 1D /var>? De nos jours, plus personne ne sait comment agrandir une porte du néant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003070_VARSHAHN<tab>Even could you force the portal wide enough, you would be greeted by an army of murderous horrors the very instant you stepped through.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003070_VARSHAHN<tab>Et quand bien même tu y parviendrais, tu serais assaillie par une horde de monstres sitôt que tu aurais posé le pied dans le treizième reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003080_YSHTOLA<tab>I assure you I was most attentive. And I agree that to go alone would be certain death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003080_YSHTOLA<tab>J'en suis tout à fait consciente, je vous rassure. Et je n'ai pas l'intention de m'aventurer là-bas toute seule, ce serait du suicide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>But if I were to bring along one who has already braved the Thirteenth and humbled the Cloud of Darkness─well, I imagine my chances would be much improved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>En revanche, accompagnée de quelqu'un qui a déjà fait le voyage – au hasard, <var 08 E905 ((la tombeuse)) ((le tombeur)) /var> du Nuage de Ténèbres – je me dis que j'aurais plus de chances de m'en sortir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Count me in.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'en suis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>So much for taking it easy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tout un programme...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>I had a feeling you might say that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>Hé hé. Je savais que tu serais partant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003110_YSHTOLA<tab>Once again, I put my life in your ever-reliable hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003110_YSHTOLA<tab>Ravie de pouvoir compter sur tes talents une fois de plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003120_YSHTOLA<tab>Since when were you one for the quiet life?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003120_YSHTOLA<tab>Eh bien alors<var 1D /var>? Toi qui es allergique à l'inaction, ça devrait te plaire, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003130_YSHTOLA<tab>Once again, I put my life in your ever-reliable hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003130_YSHTOLA<tab>On fera une bonne équipe, comme toujours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003140_YSHTOLA<tab>That said, as much as I would like to march straight back to the voidgate, there is the small matter of being unable to open it without the satrap's personal authority...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003140_YSHTOLA<tab>Si je m'écoutais, je ferais tout de suite mes valises pour le treizième reflet. Mais je n'oublie pas que la porte du néant qui nous préoccupe est sous la juridiction de Radz-at-Han depuis des temps immémoriaux. Par conséquent, je ne me permettrais rien sans l'aval de son satrape...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003150_VARSHAHN<tab>As I've said before, I will grant you and yours any boon you choose to name...provided it does not endanger my people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003150_VARSHAHN<tab>Comme je vous l'ai déjà dit, je vous suis redevable, et de ce fait disposé à vous accorder bien des faveurs... tant qu'elles ne mettent pas mon peuple en péril.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003160_YSHTOLA<tab>You have my word that we will take every precaution─not a single voidsent will be allowed to threaten Radz-at-Han. Assuming we manage to expand the portal in the first place...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003160_YSHTOLA<tab>Bien sûr, nous prendrons toutes les précautions nécessaires afin qu'aucune créature ne s'échappe de ce côté-ci. Quoi qu'il en soit, nous devons d'abord trouver un moyen d'élargir la porte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003170_ESTINIEN<tab>You have a plan?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003170_ESTINIEN<tab>Tu saurais comment t'y prendre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>Actually, I had hoped you might help us with that. I presume the alchemists you retained supplied you with some explanation of their methodology?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>Je vous renvoie la question. Seriez-vous en mesure de nous expliquer la méthode employée jadis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003190_VARSHAHN<tab>That they did. House Daemir was overseeing the project...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003190_VARSHAHN<tab>Oui, dans les grandes lignes. En vérité, c'est moi qui avais demandé aux Daemir de mener des recherches sur l'agrandissement des failles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003200_YSHTOLA<tab>Daemir, Daemir... Ah, yes, the family associated with the Great Work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003200_YSHTOLA<tab>Les Daemir... C'est cette illustre lignée d'alchimistes à laquelle le Grand Œuvre rend hommage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003210_VARSHAHN<tab>I did not fully comprehend the theory, but their research began with a voidsent which had slipped through the fissure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003210_VARSHAHN<tab>Je n'ai pas tous les détails, mais j'ai souvenir qu'ils avaient commencé par capturer puis étudier une certaine créature apparue à travers l'une d'elles...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003220_VARSHAHN<tab>After a thorough examination, they created an arcane simulacrum possessed of similar qualities. A man-made voidsent, if you will. It was apparently indispensable in their efforts to enlarge the gate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003220_VARSHAHN<tab>Et qu'ils avaient ensuite fabriqué un pantin reproduisant ses facultés – une créature du néant ar<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>cielle, en quelque sorte. C'est elle qui leur permettait apparemment d'agrandir les failles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003230_YSHTOLA<tab>...A man-made voidsent?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003230_YSHTOLA<tab>Une créature du néant... ar<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>cielle<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003240_VARSHAHN<tab>Yes. Being great admirers of the Archons, House Daemir submitted detailed notes to Sharlayan's official committee. They expected praise and accolades for their simulacrum...and were thus devastated to be informed that their work had been classified as prohibited material.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003240_VARSHAHN<tab>Pour l'anecdote, les Daemir étaient de grands admirateurs des érudits sharlayanais. Ils ont d'ailleurs tenté de soumettre leurs travaux au Conseil, mais ce dernier, loin de les applaudir, les a censurés avant de confisquer tous leurs documents. Ils sont tombés de très haut, ce jour-là...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003250_YSHTOLA<tab>If that's true, then those notes might still be stored in a forbidden archive somewhere. Not Gubal, of course, since that library had yet to be built. Which leaves us with...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003250_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais alors, ces écrits doivent toujours reposer quelque part dans un rayonnage interdit... Et sachant que la Grande bibliothèque de Gubal n'existait pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment pas à cette époque...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>With the restricted section of Noumenon?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu penses qu'ils sont au Noumène<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>With G'raha's favorite place to sneak around.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Peut-être là où G'raha s'est faufilé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A14_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>With...what?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A14_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je ne vois pas où tu veux en venir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes, it may very well hold a copy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>J'en suis même presque certaine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003270_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. Noumenon's restricted stacks may very well hold a copy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003270_YSHTOLA<tab>... Au Noumène. Tu as raison, je parie qu'ils ont été entreposés là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003280_YSHTOLA<tab>Have you already forgotten G'raha's debacle in Noumenon?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003280_YSHTOLA<tab>Ne me dis pas que tu as déjà oublié la tentative d'in<var 16 /var>fil<var 16 /var>tra<var 16 /var>tion ratée de notre ami G'raha Tia<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003290_YSHTOLA<tab>...The restricted section where he was caught sneaking about? It may very well hold a copy of the Daemirs' documentation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003290_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu te souviens, au Noumène<var 1D /var>? Même qu'il s'est fait attraper comme un voleur<var 1D /var>! Enfin bref, je suis persuadée que les documents qui nous intéressent ont été entreposés là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>In which case, I say we head directly to Sharlayan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>Bon, partons tout de suite pour Sharlayan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003310_ESTINIEN<tab>Unless you anticipate needing help to reach the high shelves, I see myself being of little use. Go on ahead. I still need to find Mehrahd and tell him about the Khalzahl Foundation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003310_ESTINIEN<tab>Je passe mon tour pour cette fois. Ma présence ne vous serait pas d'une grande utilité. Je vais plutôt aller chercher Mehrahd pour lui annoncer les dernières bonnes nouvelles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003320_YSHTOLA<tab>Let us be on our way, as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003320_YSHTOLA<tab>Bien, mettons-nous en route.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003330_VARSHAHN<tab>They are resolved to venture into the void. Do I sit idly by...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003330_VARSHAHN<tab>Ils ont vraiment l'intention de s'aventurer dans le néant...<var 1D /var>? Que suis-je censé faire dans pareille situation...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003340_YSHTOLA<tab>If House Daemir's notes are to be found anywhere, it will be here. Let us begin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003340_YSHTOLA<tab>Les écrits des alchimistes Daemir se trouvent quelque part dans ces rayons. Trouvons-les.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003350_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes, the aether signature is unmistakable. I've felt the traces of House Daemir's resonance many times at the Great Work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003350_YSHTOLA<tab>La signature éthérée qui se dégage de cette écriture... Pas de doute, c'est celle des Daemir. Je l'ai aperçue de nombreuses fois au Grand Œuvre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003360_YSHTOLA<tab>Time to see what all the fuss was about...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003360_YSHTOLA<tab>Voyons un peu ce que ça raconte...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003370_YSHTOLA<tab>“Among the ranks of the voidsent, there exist entities with the power to call forth their brethren from beyond. The species known as ”Atomos,“ however, is uniquely prodigious in this regard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003370_YSHTOLA<tab>“Parmi les créatures du néant, il en existe certaines capables d'invoquer leurs semblables en nombre. Citons notamment une espèce chez qui cette faculté est ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nellement développée<var 1D /var>: l'atomos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003380_YSHTOLA<tab>“From its distended maw, it can expel an endless procession of voidborn creatures─a talent which sorely tested the Radiant Host in its battles against these abominations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003380_YSHTOLA<tab>Les soldats de l'Ost rayonnant peuvent en témoigner<var 1D /var>: leur gueule béante déverse volontiers des flots ininterrompus de monstres, les rendant très difficiles à subjuguer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003390_YSHTOLA<tab>“Surmising that the entity itself was acting as a voidgate, we endeavored to capture a small specimen and subsequently examine its physiological structure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003390_YSHTOLA<tab>Nous avons émis l'hypothèse que ces créatures fonctionnaient peu ou prou comme des portes du néant vivantes, et avons capturé un spécimen pour étudier de plus près cette étonnante spécificité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>“Our findings revealed that the Atomos had absorbed a planar fissure into its own flesh, which it could expand at will into a functioning gate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>Ainsi, nous avons découvert que les atomos étaient capables de prendre possession des failles dimensionnelles na<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment formées – aussi appelées fissures du néant – et de les agrandir en portes du néant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>“Upon further analysis, we identified an aetherial wave pattern emitted during this process─a pattern we were able to emulate by passing crystal-stored aether through a specially designed prism.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Après avoir analysé en détail l'onde éthérée émise lors de cette opération, nous avons pu mettre au point un prisme permettant de la reproduire à partir de n'importe quel cristal chargé d'éther.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>“We proceeded to embed said prism into an arcane simulacrum, thus completing what we have dubbed our 'artificial Atomos.'”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>Nous avons ensuite greffé ce dernier à une marionnette magique, créant de fait un 'atomos artificiel'.“

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>How could I have been so blind to the possibilities? This species, not to mention its ability to summon voidsent, has been discussed among academics for years now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>J'aurais dû y penser... Les atomos sont connus depuis longtemps, justement pour leur capacité à invoquer d'autres créatures du néant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>Just before the advent of the Seventh Umbral Calamity, we received reports of Atomos sightings from every corner of Eorzea. Surely you witnessed an appearance yourself in the course of your travels?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>Je me souviens qu'ils étaient apparus un peu partout en Éorzéa à l'époque du septième fléau... et qu'ils avaient déversé des flots d'horribles monstres, juste avant la chute de Dalamud... Toi-même, tu les as peut-être croisés à ce moment-là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>Just before the advent of the Seventh Umbral Calamity, we received reports of Atomos sightings from every corner of Eorzea. Surely you've at least heard the tales?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>Je me souviens que leur présence avait été signalée un peu partout en Éorzéa, juste avant la survenue du septième fléau. Toi-même, tu en as peut-être déjà entendu parler<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003460_YSHTOLA<tab>And still House Daemir went and built a mock Atomos of their very own. I'm not surprised the Archons consigned their work to a restricted archive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003460_YSHTOLA<tab>Fabriquer une pseudo-créature du néant... Tu m'étonnes que le Conseil ait vu rouge...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003470_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twas no easy task, but at last we've unearthed the volume we've been searching for.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003470_YSHTOLA<tab>Bon, au moins, je suis contente d'avoir mis la main sur l'ouvrage qui nous intéressait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003480_YSHTOLA<tab>I'd be lying if I said I wasn't tempted to stay longer. See what other forbidden titles might be lurking on these shelves...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003480_YSHTOLA<tab>Si ça ne tenait qu'à moi, j'en profiterais pour bouquiner encore un peu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003490_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah, but that would be abusing the very special privilege we've been granted now, wouldn't it? Better not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003490_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais je ne voudrais pas trahir la confiance de nos alliés du Conseil, sans qui on nous aurait claqué la porte au nez. Je serai raisonnable... pour cette fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003500_NIDHANA<tab>The ruins alone were impressive enough, but I never dreamed such a treasure lay hidden in the depths of the Bounty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003500_NIDHANA<tab>La présence de ces vestiges est déjà im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>nante en soi, mais qu'un tel dispositif dorme depuis toujours au fond de la mer de l'Abondance... J'en reste bouche bée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003510_NIDHANA<tab>It may have been helpful to know this device existed, Your Excellency.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003510_NIDHANA<tab>Vous auriez tout de même pu m'en parler plus tôt, Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003520_VARSHAHN<tab>My apologies...the gate was a secret I shared with none but my closest advisors. I feared for what might happen should those with ill intentions learn of its existence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003520_VARSHAHN<tab>Euh, eh bien... désolé. Je n'ai jamais révélé l'existence de cette porte qu'au satrape officiel et à son entourage le plus proche, de peur qu'elle ne soit utilisée à mauvais dessein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003530_ESTINIEN<tab>What is it you're doing now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003530_ESTINIEN<tab>Et qu'est-ce qu'on fait maintenant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003540_YSHTOLA<tab>There is something I wish to verify.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003540_YSHTOLA<tab>Il y a un point que j'aimerais vérifier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003550_YSHTOLA<tab>The NOAH reports claim that a short stint into the void carries little risk of aetheric imbalance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003550_YSHTOLA<tab>À en croire les rapports de l'équipe Noah sur la Tour de Cristal, nous pourrions nous aventurer brièvement dans le treizième reflet sans risquer de nous transformer en créatures du néant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003560_YSHTOLA<tab>Should one suffer an injury, however, or if one's expedition drags on longer than intended, that risk becomes significantly greater.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003560_YSHTOLA<tab>En revanche, tout séjour prolongé nous exposerait à un risque élevé de mutation...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>G'raha theorized that a warding scale would confer protection from the void's corrupting influence... But I would prefer to test that hypothesis before we set foot in the Thirteenth ourselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>G'raha Tia pense que les écailles garde-âme pourraient nous protéger. Évidemment, il vaudrait mieux en être sûrs et certains avant de tenter le voyage...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003580_ESTINIEN<tab>So...this is an experiment of sorts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003580_ESTINIEN<tab>Et comment vas-tu confirmer cette hypothèse<var 1D /var>? Par une expérience de ton cru<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003590_YSHTOLA<tab>Yes. An experiment... Tell me: how would <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> go about testing the efficacy of the warding scale?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003590_YSHTOLA<tab>Tout juste. Je vais éprouver l'efficacité des écailles garde-âme dans le treizième reflet... par un biais que tu auras peut-être deviné...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Might as well go myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'ai compris, je m'y colle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>(Say nothing and look meaningfully at Estinien.)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>(Ne rien dire et lancer un regard insistant à Estinien)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A15_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Maybe send a familiar?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A15_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu vas y envoyer un familier, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003600_ESTINIEN<tab>And how would you do that? The gate is still too small for any of us to pass through.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003600_ESTINIEN<tab>Puisqu'on te dit que la porte est trop petite pour un humain... Suis un peu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003610_YSHTOLA<tab>Estinien is correct. Which is why I've elected to send a familiar in our stead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003610_YSHTOLA<tab>Pour un humain, oui... mais pas pour un familier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003620_ESTINIEN<tab>What? Why are you looking at me like that? Surely you'd not expect me to wriggle through that tiny portal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003620_ESTINIEN<tab>J-je t'arrête tout de suite, il n'est pas question que je me mette à quatre pattes pour passer à travers cette fichue porte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003630_YSHTOLA<tab>We needn't attempt anything so drastic. A small familiar should serve well enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003630_YSHTOLA<tab>Personne n'aura à se mettre à quatre pattes. Pour cette expérience, un simple familier fera l'affaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003640_YSHTOLA<tab>Very good. I see you've been paying attention.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003640_YSHTOLA<tab>Dans le mille. Décidément, ton esprit est toujours aussi aiguisé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003650_YSHTOLA<tab>As Vrtra sent his simulacrum, so too shall we rely on a familiar to bear the brunt of any unpleasant consequences.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003650_YSHTOLA<tab>Jadis, Vrtra avait envoyé un pantin de l'autre côté. Eh bien, nous allons en faire de même avec un familier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003660_YSHTOLA<tab>Now, a lowly imp can navigate a fissure, no matter how narrow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003660_YSHTOLA<tab>Même la plus étroite des fissures laisse parfois filtrer des créatures de rang inférieur, comme des imps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003670_YSHTOLA<tab>Which means an arcane entity of similar stature should be able to manage the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003670_YSHTOLA<tab>Autrement dit, nous devrions être en mesure d'envoyer des familiers de petite taille dans le sens inverse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003680_YSHTOLA<tab>I hadn't wanted it to come to this...but no other familiars will do, I'm afraid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003680_YSHTOLA<tab>Ceux auxquels je pense s'y prêteraient par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment... En général, j'essaye de m'en passer, mais vu qu'il s'agit d'un cas de force majeure...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003690_ESTINIEN<tab>I mislike the sound of that. What manner of fiend does she mean to summon...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003690_ESTINIEN<tab>Je ne sais pas trop à quoi m'attendre... Si même la redoutable Y'shtola rechigne à les invoquer, c'est que ces familiers doivent vraiment être terrifiants...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003700_YSHTOLA<tab>From ocean rise and cloudbank form,
From mountain spring and rainfall storm,
From river flow and life be born...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003700_YSHTOLA<tab>De la mer, vous vous élevez et façonnez les nuages... Des montagnes, vous ruisselez et formez les rivières... Vous, la source de toute vie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003710_YSHTOLA<tab>Water, water, froth and foam!♪
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003710_YSHTOLA<tab>Turlututu et tralalaaa<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003720_ESTINIEN<tab>Ready your arms. I fear she's been possessed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003720_ESTINIEN<tab>Elle nous fait une crise de démence ou quoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003730_NIDHANA<tab>Oh, come now, that was adorable!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003730_NIDHANA<tab>En voilà, une incantation rigolote<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003740_NOKKEN<tab>Water, water, froth and foam!♪
Time to play!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003740_NOKKEN<tab>Tralalaaa<var 1D /var>!♪ C'est l'heure de s'amuser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003750_YSHTOLA<tab>Though not my first choice, these familiars I conceived of as a child have the best chance of fitting through the gate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003750_YSHTOLA<tab>J'ai invoqué les familiers les plus pauvres en éther qui soient, histoire d'être sûre qu'ils puissent passer par la porte. Voilà, voilà...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003760_YSHTOLA<tab>...I only wish my younger self had considered a more dignified ending to the creation ritual.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003760_YSHTOLA<tab>Pour ce qui est des derniers mots de la “formule magique”, il faudra demander à l'enfant que j'étais d'où lui est venue cette brillante inspiration...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003770_YSHTOLA<tab>In any case, these two should serve us well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003770_YSHTOLA<tab>Bref, ces deux petites nixes vont se faire un plaisir de visiter le treizième reflet à notre place.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003780_YSHTOLA<tab>This one will bear a warding scale...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003780_YSHTOLA<tab>Une seule d'entre elles portera une écaille garde-âme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003790_YSHTOLA<tab>And when they return from the Thirteenth, we can observe how the talisman─or absence thereof─has affected the progress of the void's corruption.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003790_YSHTOLA<tab>À leur retour, nous n'aurons qu'à comparer leurs états respectifs pour déterminer l'efficacité de l'écaille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003800_YSHTOLA<tab>If I could impose upon you to open the gate, Your Excellency?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003800_YSHTOLA<tab>Vrtra, si vous voulez bien desceller la porte du néant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003810_VARSHAHN<tab>Ah, yes, of course...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003810_VARSHAHN<tab>E-euh, d'accord...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003820_YSHTOLA<tab>We should also be wary of voidsent slipping through while we conduct our experiment. Estinien, you are to keep Nidhana safe from harm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003820_YSHTOLA<tab>Des monstres pourraient surgir pendant que la porte est grande ouverte. Estinien, je te charge de protéger Nidhana.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003830_ESTINIEN<tab>As you say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003830_ESTINIEN<tab>Ç-ça marche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003840_YSHTOLA<tab>You had best be on your guard, as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003840_YSHTOLA<tab>Reste sur le qui-vive, toi aussi. On ne sait jamais ce qui peut se passer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q16_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q16_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A16_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I always am.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A16_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Compte sur moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A16_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Froth and foam!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A16_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Turlututu et tralalaaa<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A16_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A16_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003850_YSHTOLA<tab>And we are glad for it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003850_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est dans ce genre de moments que je suis contente de t'avoir à mes côtés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003860_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh? Are you volunteering to join the nixies? I could shrink you down, you know...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003860_YSHTOLA<tab>Je peux encore te pousser dans la porte du néant à la place des nixes, tu sais<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003870_YSHTOLA<tab>Please, just...do me a favor, and forget you ever saw that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003870_YSHTOLA<tab>S'il te plaît, oublie cette histoire d'incantation. J'ai déjà assez honte comme ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003880_YSHTOLA<tab>Let us begin, shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003880_YSHTOLA<tab>Allez, c'est parti.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003890_YSHTOLA<tab>Nixies! Into the void!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003890_YSHTOLA<tab>En avant, les nixes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003900_NOKKEN<tab>Water, water, froth and foam! Into shadowed realms we roam!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003900_NOKKEN<tab>Tralalaaa<var 1D /var>!♪ Allez hop<var 1D /var>! À tout à l'heure les amis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003910_YSHTOLA<tab>I think we've waited long enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003910_YSHTOLA<tab>Bien, je pense qu'on a assez attendu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003920_YSHTOLA<tab>Nixies! Return to my side!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003920_YSHTOLA<tab>À moi, les nixes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003930_DARKNOKKEN<tab>Water...water... <splutter>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003930_DARKNOKKEN<tab>Tra... lala... la...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003940_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank you, little one. You did well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003940_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est bon, c'est fini. Tu as été très courageuse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003950_NIDHANA<tab>The poor thing. Its essence has been irrevocably warped...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003950_NIDHANA<tab>La pauvre... Le néant l'a presque entièrement transformée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003960_VOIDSENTA<tab>I smell you...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003960_VOIDSENTA<tab>Mmmm, cette délicieuse odeur d'étheeer<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003970_VOIDSENTB<tab>I cannot die... I WANT to die... Kill me... END ME...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003970_VOIDSENTB<tab>Je veux mourir... mais je ne peux pas... Quelqu'un... Tuez-moi... s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003980_VOIDSENTC<tab>Light! I see light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003980_VOIDSENTC<tab>Là-bas... je vois... une lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003990_VOIDSENTD<tab>(-Sinister Voice-)Open! Open! OPEN!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_003990_VOIDSENTD<tab>(-Voix sinistre-)La porte... La porte est ouverte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004000_VARSHAHN<tab>We're out of time! I must reseal the voidgate!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004000_VARSHAHN<tab>Des créatures approchent<var 1D /var>! Je referme la porte tout de suite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004010_NIDHANA<tab>They're coming through!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004010_NIDHANA<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! Les voilà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004020_VARSHAHN<tab>In the name of Alzadaal III... I bar this door unto the void!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004020_VARSHAHN<tab>Machine des temps anciens... Au nom d'Alzadaal III, je t'ordonne d'obturer à nouveau ce passage maléfique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004030_NIDHANA<tab>Well, that was a sharp lesson in the dangers of voidgates...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004030_NIDHANA<tab>Grands Dieux... À présent, nous savons pourquoi il ne faut pas prendre les portes du néant à la légère...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004040_ESTINIEN<tab>And what of our experiment? I'd say the results speak for themselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004040_ESTINIEN<tab>Alors, ta conclusion<var 1D /var>? Je pense que le résultat parle de lui-même, mais bon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004050_YSHTOLA<tab>The unprotected nixie has suffered extensive aetheric corruption. As Nidhana observed, it's well on its way to becoming a voidsent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004050_YSHTOLA<tab>L'éther de la nixe qui ne portait pas d'écaille s'est troublé au point d'entraîner des mutations. Un peu plus et elle devenait ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment une créature du néant à part entière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004060_YSHTOLA<tab>The one merged with the talisman, however, appears unaffected. I sense no changes to its equilibrium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004060_YSHTOLA<tab>L'autre en revanche a l'air de se porter comme un charme, y compris sur le plan éthéré.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004070_YSHTOLA<tab>Rest now, little ones.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004070_YSHTOLA<tab>Merci pour ton dévouement. Repose-toi, tu l'as bien mérité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004080_ESTINIEN<tab>G'raha's theory was correct, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004080_ESTINIEN<tab>G'raha Tia avait donc vu juste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004090_YSHTOLA<tab>So it would seem. But while our second familiar was untouched by void energies, the talisman itself shows signs of degradation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004090_YSHTOLA<tab>Il y a tout de même un bémol<var 1D /var>: la nixe est certes revenue indemne, mais son écaille garde-âme présente des signes de détérioration.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004100_YSHTOLA<tab>It was, of course, originally designed to shield the soul from primal tempering─it stands to reason that aetheric corruption of a different sort would affect it differently.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004100_YSHTOLA<tab>À l'origine, ces talismans ont été conçus pour bloquer les radiations éthérées qui contrôlent l'esprit. On ne peut pas attendre d'eux la même efficacité face aux autres types d'ondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004110_YSHTOLA<tab>We may need to modify the warding scale's design to account for the Thirteenth's uniquely unstable aether...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004110_YSHTOLA<tab>Pour qu'ils puissent résister durablement à l'environnement délétère du treizième reflet, des mo<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions seront sans doute à prévoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004120_ESTINIEN<tab>You've said much of the void's instability, but my imagination fails me. What manner of place is this broken world?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004120_ESTINIEN<tab>Pardonne mon ignorance, mais... sans trop entrer dans les détails, quel genre de monde est le treizième reflet<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004130_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah, my apologies. I forget that not all of us spend our days sequestered in dusty archives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004130_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu fais bien de poser la question. À ce stade, je pense qu'une piqûre de rappel ne ferait de mal à personne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004140_YSHTOLA<tab>The Thirteenth is a reflection of the Source that was drowned in a flood of Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004140_YSHTOLA<tab>Le treizième reflet est celui qui a été englouti par un déluge de Ténèbres. Il n'en reste quasiment rien, c'est pour cette raison qu'on l'appelle aussi le “néant”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004150_YSHTOLA<tab>In Emet-Selch's own words, this tragedy was a result of the Ascians' attempts to force a Rejoining. They erred in their haste, and made of that world a “useless void.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004150_YSHTOLA<tab>Emet-Selch l'a décrit comme le fruit d'une tentative ratée des Asciens de forcer la réunification des mondes. Ce fiasco l'a tant défiguré qu'au bout du compte, ils s'en sont désintéressés...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004160_YSHTOLA<tab>You remember Unukalhai, the unusual child we met during our troubles with the Warring Triad? He explained the fate of the Thirteenth thus:
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004160_YSHTOLA<tab>L'origine du Déluge nous a quant à elle été contée par Unukalhai, un jeune garçon rencontré lorsque nous combattions la Triade guerrière... et qui a la particularité d'être immortel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004170_YSHTOLA<tab>The champions of that ill-fated world used the stone known as “auracite” to contain the power of primals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004170_YSHTOLA<tab>D'après lui, c'est dans le treizième reflet – son monde – que sont nées les auralithes, ces fameuses pierres magiques capables d'absorber la puissance des Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004180_YSHTOLA<tab>But those selfsame heroes were gradually corrupted by the auracite's bleeding energies, transforming into fiends with an endless hunger for aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004180_YSHTOLA<tab>Les héros de là-bas s'en servaient pour tenter de soumettre les divinités locales. Hélas, ils se sont laissé dévorer par le pouvoir des pierres, et ont fini par se métamorphoser en monstres assoiffés d'éther...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004190_YSHTOLA<tab>By the time anyone thought to oppose them, Light's strength had grown too feeble...and the balance of the Thirteenth tipped into eternal Darkness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004190_YSHTOLA<tab>Peu à peu, les Ténèbres ont pris le pas sur la Lumière... jusqu'à ce que l'inévitable se produise...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004200_YSHTOLA<tab>It was Elidibus, as I recall, who rescued Unukalhai's spirit from his final battlefield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004200_YSHTOLA<tab>Au passage... si mes souvenirs sont bons, Unukalhai a été sauvé de justesse par Elidibus, juste avant que son âme ne s'éteigne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004210_YSHTOLA<tab>But I wonder if there were others whom the Emissary saved from oblivion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004210_YSHTOLA<tab>J'imagine qu'il n'est pas le seul à avoir été manipulé par le “médiateur”...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q17_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q17_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A17_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>The barmaid at the Wandering Stairs...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A17_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il y a aussi la serveuse des Marches nébuleuses...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A17_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ardbert's companion, the elven swordswoman...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A17_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il y a aussi la guerrière elfe, camarade d'Ardbert...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004220_YSHTOLA<tab>The server...Cyella, wasn't it? And you say she was another of Elidibus's pawns?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004220_YSHTOLA<tab>La serveuse des Marches nébuleuses... Tu parles... de Cyella, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Elle aussi aurait été “repêchée” par Elidibus<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004230_YSHTOLA<tab>Cylva? The adventurer who traveled with the Warriors of Light? And you say she was another of Elidibus's pawns?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004230_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu parles de Cylva, l'ancienne Guerrière de la Lumière<var 1D /var>? Elle aussi aurait été “repêchée” par Elidibus<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004240_YSHTOLA<tab>I see... So Cyella, or rather, Cylva, was beguiled by the same dreams of heroism as Unukalhai.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004240_YSHTOLA<tab>Je vois... Cyella, ou plutôt Cylva, s'est donc elle aussi laissé appâter par la promesse de devenir une héroïne...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004250_YSHTOLA<tab>And what of your own experience? Will you tell us of what you observed during NOAH's expedition?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004250_YSHTOLA<tab>Tiens, toi qui as voyagé en personne dans le treizième reflet au nom de l'équipe Noah, pourrais-tu nous décrire les paysages que tu as vus<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004260_YSHTOLA<tab>I can picture it now... The sunless, stygian expanse, infested with legions of aether-starved monstrosities. A void in every sense of the word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004260_YSHTOLA<tab>Un monde plongé dans les Ténèbres, où l'on ne distingue plus la lumière du jour... et dont les seuls habitants sont des dévoreurs d'éther grouillant par centaines... Il n'y a pas à dire, le néant porte bien son nom.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004270_VARSHAHN<tab>What you have described in such lurid detail is exactly why I hesitate to encourage you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004270_VARSHAHN<tab>J'espère que tu comprends à présent ma réticence à vous laisser vous y aventurer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004280_YSHTOLA<tab>Worry not, great Vrtra─our journey into the Thirteenth is but the first leg of a longer voyage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004280_YSHTOLA<tab>Elle est toute légitime. Mais vous devez savoir qu'à mes yeux, le voyage vers le treizième reflet n'est qu'une étape.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004290_YSHTOLA<tab>A voyage that shall lead us to other reflections─to new mysteries and discoveries─and I mean to be there every step of the way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004290_YSHTOLA<tab>Mon but à terme est de pouvoir aller et venir librement entre les mondes, et de résoudre l'ensemble des mystères qu'ils recèlent. Autant vous dire que je ne compte pas reculer de sitôt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004300_YSHTOLA<tab>But first I must focus on refining the warding talisman...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004300_YSHTOLA<tab>Seulement, avant d'aller plus loin, il va nous falloir trouver un moyen de renforcer les écailles garde-âme...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004310_NIDHANA<tab>Then I can begin work on constructing an artificial Atomos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004310_NIDHANA<tab>Bon courage à vous. Pendant ce temps, je vais tenter de fabriquer un atomos artificiel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004320_NIDHANA<tab>Or, I could if I had the relevant manuals to hand. Might I be so bold as to request access to the satrap's family archives?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004320_NIDHANA<tab>Votre Excellence, pourrais-je avoir accès aux archives du palais du Meghaduta<var 1D /var>? Je crains de ne pas trouver de documentation pertinente au Grand Œuvre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004330_NIDHANA<tab>Ahem...Your Excellency?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004330_NIDHANA<tab>Euh... Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004340_VARSHAHN<tab>Hm...? Oh! Yes, that can be arranged. I will speak to my officials upon our return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004340_VARSHAHN<tab>O-oui, oui, j'ai entendu. Pas de problème, j'en toucherai un mot au personnel du palais à mon retour.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004350_NIDHANA<tab>We will see you back in the city, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004350_NIDHANA<tab>Bon, eh bien on vous laisse<var 1D /var>! À plus tard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004360_NIDHANA<tab>Ah, Y'shtola! The adjustments are going well, I hope?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004360_NIDHANA<tab>Oh, vous revoilà. Vous avez pu renforcer les écailles<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004370_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis a lengthy process, but the end is in sight, yes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004370_YSHTOLA<tab>Ça va prendre un peu de temps, mais elles sont entre de bonnes mains.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004380_NIDHANA<tab>That's wonderful news! I, myself, had some good fortune searching through the satrap's private records.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004380_NIDHANA<tab>Formidable<var 1D /var>! Grâce à l'aval de Vrtra, j'ai pu de mon côté fourrer ma trompe dans les archives du palais, et dénicher de nombreuses in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions in<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>res<var 16 /var>santes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004390_NIDHANA<tab>What I found was a transaction log, dated around the same period as when Alzadaal's Legacy was built. It included a purchase list of highly exclusive alchemical components...and I knew I'd discovered the key to making the artificial Atomos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004390_NIDHANA<tab>J'ai par exemple feuilleté des bons de commande datant de la con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion du palais englouti, et découvert la mention d'un ingrédient d'alchimie peu banal. Je serais prête à parier qu'il a servi à la fabrication de l'atomos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004400_NIDHANA<tab>I then visited the High Crucible to commission the materials. After I'd explained my requirements, I was beset by volunteers insisting I allow them to help with the entire project!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004400_NIDHANA<tab>Je suis justement passée tout à l'heure au Creuset de l'Al-Kimiya pour m'en procurer. J'ai expliqué aux gens quel était mon but, et ça a eu l'air de les passionner<var 1D /var>! Au point qu'ils ont décidé de me donner un coup de main<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004410_YSHTOLA<tab>The usual reaction to someone forcing open a voidgate is to run for the hills... Hannish academics certainly are a different breed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004410_YSHTOLA<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>? Pourtant, notre projet d'agrandir une porte du néant aurait de quoi faire lever quelques sourcils... Il faut croire que les alchimistes de Radz-at-Han sont aussi talentueux qu'ouverts d'esprit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004420_VARSHAHN<tab>The alchemists of old were cut from a similar cloth. The unknown held no fear for them─indeed, they were ever eager to seek new knowledge, regardless of the danger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004420_VARSHAHN<tab>J'ai reconnu dans leur regard cette soif inextinguible de con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce<var 1D /var>; ce goût pour l'inconnu, au mépris de toute peur... Les yeux de leurs prédécesseurs brillaient du même éclat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004430_YSHTOLA<tab>And were you not also fearless─heedless, even─in your determination?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004430_YSHTOLA<tab>N'avez-vous jamais songé à vous en inspirer<var 1D /var>? À faire fi du danger pour réaliser un souhait qui vous est cher<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004440_VARSHAHN<tab>...My sire entered his dormancy before I was hatched. And so it was Azdaja who kept my egg safe and warm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004440_VARSHAHN<tab>... Comme je vous l'ai dit, j'ai éclos très tardivement. C'est d'ailleurs Azdaja qui a couvé mon œuf, puisque mon père Midgardsormr était déjà entré en hibernation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004450_VARSHAHN<tab>It created a bond between us. Even long after I learned to fend for myself, I rarely strayed from her side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004450_VARSHAHN<tab>Cela explique peut-être pourquoi j'ai continué à m'accrocher à elle après ma naissance, comme un poussin à ses parents...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004460_VARSHAHN<tab>She was my guardian, my sister, my dear companion...and not a single day passes that I do not mourn her absence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004460_VARSHAHN<tab>Je la considère comme ma grande sœur... presque comme ma mère... et il ne se passe pas un jour sans que je ne pense à elle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004470_VARSHAHN<tab>No matter how deep the darkness, I would not surrender my search. I promised myself the time would come when we would once more take to the skies together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004470_VARSHAHN<tab>Je voudrais la revoir. Voler de nouveau à ses côtés. Les années ont beau défiler, ce désir ne m'a jamais quitté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004480_VARSHAHN<tab>But I am satrap now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004480_VARSHAHN<tab>Hélas, je suis pieds et poings liés...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004490_NAHBDEEN<tab>The Radiant Host is here to serve, Your Excellency!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004490_NAHBDEEN<tab>(-???-)Vous oubliez vos alliés de l'Ost rayonnant, Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004500_VARSHAHN<tab>Nahbdeen. What is this about...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004500_VARSHAHN<tab>Nahbdeen...<var 1D /var>? Que fais-tu ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004510_NAHBDEEN<tab>Ser Estinien told us of your predicament.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004510_NAHBDEEN<tab>Estinien nous a tout raconté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004520_NAHBDEEN<tab>For centuries you have protected Radz-at-Han, never showing your true self. Hiding behind a curtain, and living only in service to the people...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004520_NAHBDEEN<tab>Votre Excellence, cela fait des siècles que vous consacrez toute votre énergie à la protection de Radz-at-Han. Vous étiez même prêt à passer votre vie derrière un rideau pour éviter de nous effrayer...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004530_NAHBDEEN<tab>Your dedication meant more to us than your deceit, and so did we accept you as our rightful ruler.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004530_NAHBDEEN<tab>C'est bien pour cela que dragon ou pas, nous vous avons tout de suite reconnu comme notre satrape légitime.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004540_NAHBDEEN<tab>After all that you have sacrificed for this nation, did you imagine we would begrudge you your heart's desire?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004540_NAHBDEEN<tab>Aussi, je vous le demande<var 1D /var>: après tout ce que nous avons vécu, comment pouvez-vous encore penser que votre bonheur nous est égal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004550_NAHBDEEN<tab>We survived the Final Days. We are a strong and proud people. We, the Radiant Host, will keep Thavnair safe in your absence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004550_NAHBDEEN<tab>Nous avons les épaules solides, vous savez. Nous avons survécu à l'apocalypse, alors nous devrions largement être capables de défendre ce pays à nous seuls pendant quelque temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004560_VARSHAHN<tab>I am grateful for your loyalty, and for your encouragement. And yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004560_VARSHAHN<tab>Nahbdeen, ta sollicitude me touche, mais je...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004570_NAHBDEEN<tab>Now, you listen to me, Varshahn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004570_NAHBDEEN<tab>Rah... Ça suffit<var 1D /var>! Tais-toi, à la fin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004580_NAHBDEEN<tab>You are wearing that face, after all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004580_NAHBDEEN<tab>J'ai le droit de m'exprimer ainsi puisque tu es sous cette forme...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004590_NAHBDEEN<tab>As I have told you before, you are a little brother to us all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004590_NAHBDEEN<tab>Je te l'ai déjà dit, Varshahn. À nos yeux, tu es comme un petit frère. Un membre de notre famille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004600_NAHBDEEN<tab>And if you are family, then so, too, is your sister.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004600_NAHBDEEN<tab>Dès lors, ta grande sœur en fait au<var 16 /var>to<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>que<var 16 /var>ment partie, elle aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004610_NAHBDEEN<tab>We are there for you if you need us. But do not ask us to sit by and watch while you abandon a sibling you have ached to rescue for millennia!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004610_NAHBDEEN<tab>Allons, son souvenir te hante depuis des milliers d'années et tu songerais à tirer une croix sur elle<var 1D /var>? Ça n'a pas de sens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004620_NIDHANA<tab>We <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> succeed in opening the way─it is only a matter of time! All you need do is prepare to step through to the other side!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004620_NIDHANA<tab>Nous allons vous ouvrir le passage vers le monde où se trouve Azdaja<var 1D /var>! Alors, ne réfléchissez plus et foncez la chercher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004630_MEHRAHD<tab>Your Excellency... I wanted to thank you for building the orphanage. It means so much that my sister and I will have a place to be together, safe and happy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004630_MEHRAHD<tab>Votre Excellence, je voulais vous remercier pour votre projet d'orphelinat. Vous pouvez pas savoir comme je suis soulagé, moi qui craignais de me retrouver séparé de ma petite sœur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004640_MEHRAHD<tab>And I hope that you and your sister can be together again, too!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004640_MEHRAHD<tab>Je sais ce que vous ressentez... à quel point c'est dur d'être éloigné de sa seule famille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q18_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_Q18_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A18_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>To protect them well, you must take heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A18_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>C'est bien vous qui disiez qu'il fallait protéger ses proches<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A18_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Will you wallow in uncertainty forever...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_A18_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous tenez vraiment à garder ce poids sur le cœur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004650_VARSHAHN<tab>“Take heart, and protect them well.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004650_VARSHAHN<tab>“Qu'ils deviennent ta force et ton espoir.”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004660_VARSHAHN<tab>Such were the words I once said to you. And here I stand, failing to live up to them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004660_VARSHAHN<tab>Voilà que tu me retournes mon propre conseil... comme une manière habile de me reprocher mon immobilisme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004670_VARSHAHN<tab>If my heart is torn, I am fit to protect neither Azdaja, nor Radz-at-Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004670_VARSHAHN<tab>Tu as raison. Je dois aller de l'avant et me battre, aussi bien pour Azdaja que pour Radz-at-Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004680_VARSHAHN<tab>You're saying I should seize this chance?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004680_VARSHAHN<tab>Tu veux dire... qu'il m'empêche d'avancer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004690_VARSHAHN<tab>“Take heart, and protect them well.” Such were the words I once said to you. And here I stand, failing to live up to them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004690_VARSHAHN<tab>Et dire que je t'avais imploré de protéger tes proches... alors que de mon côté, je n'en faisais rien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004700_VARSHAHN<tab>If my heart is torn, I am fit to protect neither Azdaja, nor Radz-at-Han.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004700_VARSHAHN<tab>Tu as raison. Je dois aller de l'avant et me battre, aussi bien pour Azdaja que pour Radz-at-Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004710_VARSHAHN<tab>My people, I have come to a decision. Varshahn will depart Thavnair for a time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004710_VARSHAHN<tab>Mes amis, je vous informe que votre bien-aimé Varshahn va devoir s'absenter quelque temps. Veuillez l'en excuser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004720_VARSHAHN<tab>My dragon self will remain in the palace, but only to conduct the satrap's most essential duties.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004720_VARSHAHN<tab>Cette absence ne sera que partielle, puisque pour ma part, je demeurerai dans le palais du Meghaduta, et continuerai d'assurer autant que possible mon rôle de satrape.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004730_VARSHAHN<tab>While I am focused on controlling this vessel, there may be matters that escape my attention.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004730_VARSHAHN<tab>Je dois toutefois vous prévenir que je ne pourrai avoir l'œil partout, notamment lorsque je serai aux commandes de Varshahn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004740_VARSHAHN<tab>I rely on you, my trusted friends, to watch over one another until I return.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004740_VARSHAHN<tab>Je compte donc sur chacun d'entre vous pour veiller sur notre chère cité, en attendant que je parvienne à sauver Azdaja.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004750_NAHBDEEN<tab>Take care and fair fortune, little brother. Many tears would be shed should you come to harm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004750_NAHBDEEN<tab>Fais attention à toi. Comme je ne cesse de te le répéter, beaucoup ne s'en remettraient pas s'il t'arrivait malheur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004760_VARSHAHN<tab>I would not dare make you cry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004760_VARSHAHN<tab>Je tâcherai de m'en souvenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004765_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the Thirteenth...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004765_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, dans le treizième reflet...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And thus I am returned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ah... Me voilà de retour...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To this world bereft of saviors...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06100_004780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Dans ce monde qui a perdu ses héros...
